original: zhes te thabs dang shes rab mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba ni lte ba la rnam par gnas la /
analyzed: zhes te thabs dang shes rab mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba ni lte ba la rnam par gnas la /
translated: Thus, the yoga of equipoise of method and wisdom is located at the navel.

original: de'i rkang pa bzhis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i /
analyzed: de'i rkang pa bzhis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i /
translated: Its four feet are Vairochana, etc.

original: spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa bsgom //
analyzed: spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa bsgom //
translated: The feet are meditated on above the crown.

original: zhes so // de ltar na nye ba'i mtshan ma la sogs pa mthong nas lhag par gnas pas na phyogs thams cad kyi chu'i steng du 'gro nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes so // de ltar na nye ba'i mtshan ma la sogs pa mthong nas lhag par gnas pas na phyogs thams cad kyi chu'i steng du 'gro nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, having seen the proximate sign, etc., by abiding in excess, one is able to walk on the water of all directions.

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pas na lha rnams kyi spyi bo na gnas pa mi 'gal bas na ngo bo nyid dag pa zhes phyogs gcig tu brjod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pas na lha rnams kyi spyi bo na gnas pa mi 'gal bas na ngo bo nyid dag pa zhes phyogs gcig tu brjod do //
translated: Since all phenomena are pure by nature, it is not contradictory for them to abide in the crown of the deities, so they are called “pure by nature” in one place.

original: rgya mtsho la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs par bskyed pas ni rdo rje rgya mtsho'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs par bskyed pas ni rdo rje rgya mtsho'o //
translated: Since the ocean, etc., are generated as tathagatas, they are vajra oceans.

original: de dag gi rkang pas gnon pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi rkang pas gnon pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Stepping on them is called that.

original: da ni pha rol gyi ngag gnon pa'i chog gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni pha rol gyi ngag gnon pa'i chog gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the rite of suppressing the speech of others is stated:

original: dbang chen zhes pa la @68b sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbang chen zhes pa la @68b sogs pa'o //
translated: “Great power,” etc.

original: de yang ming gi yi ge dang bo las bskyed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i spyi bor lam las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ser por bsams nas /
analyzed: de yang ming gi yi ge dang bo las bskyed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i spyi bor lam las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ser por bsams nas /
translated: Moreover, having generated from the first letter of the name, one should imagine the mandala of great power, yellow in color, on the crown of the head of the one to be subdued.

original: de'i steng du ham las las kyi rdo rje padma la gnas par bzhag la gzhal yas khang bsams nas de'i dbus su khro bo'i rigs kha dog ser po 'khor lo dang ldan par bzhag nas gnon par bsgom mo //
analyzed: de'i steng du ham las las kyi rdo rje padma la gnas par bzhag la gzhal yas khang bsams nas de'i dbus su khro bo'i rigs kha dog ser po 'khor lo dang ldan par bzhag nas gnon par bsgom mo //
translated: Then, having placed the karma-vajra, arisen from the syllable ham, on a lotus, one should imagine the celestial mansion. In its center, one should imagine the wrathful type, yellow in color, holding a wheel, and one should meditate on the act of suppressing.

original: des spobs pa shin tu zhan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des spobs pa shin tu zhan par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, the other's eloquence will be greatly weakened.

original: smrar mi gzhug par bya ba'i phyir rkan gyi phugs su ham las las kyi rdo rje bskyed pa'i kha bzhis spyi bo dang / rna ba gnyis dang / lkog mar phug ste bsgoms pas de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smrar mi gzhug par bya ba'i phyir rkan gyi phugs su ham las las kyi rdo rje bskyed pa'i kha bzhis spyi bo dang / rna ba gnyis dang / lkog mar phug ste bsgoms pas de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: In order to prevent the other from speaking, one should meditate on the karma-vajra, arisen from the syllable ham, in the cavity of the palate, with its four faces piercing the crown of the head, the two ears, and the throat.

original: mu stegs can ni nam mkha'i gos can la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mu stegs can ni nam mkha'i gos can la sogs pa'o //
translated: The heretics are the sky-clad ones and so forth.

original: phas kyi rgol ba ni phyir rgol ba thams cad do //
analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba ni phyir rgol ba thams cad do //
translated: The adversaries are all opponents.

original: de'i gnod par byed pa nyid rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i gnod par byed pa nyid rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra is that which harms them.

original: dpung gnon pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpung gnon pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: The rite of subjugating an army is taught.

original: rdo rje gsum mchog ces pa ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams te /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum mchog ces pa ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams te /
translated: The “three supreme vajras” are the members of the maṇḍala.

original: khro bo'i ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: khro bo'i ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What are they like?

original: padmo ser po'i mdog 'dra ba che chung gi tshad ri'i rgyal po ltar bsams nas zhes so //
analyzed: padmo ser po'i mdog 'dra ba che chung gi tshad ri'i rgyal po ltar bsams nas zhes so //
translated: They are imagined to be the size of Mount Meru, the color of a yellow lotus.

original: de dpung rnams kyi spyi bor snga ma bzhin du ri rab kyi steng du bsgoms pas dpung sa'i 'og tu bying bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dpung rnams kyi spyi bor snga ma bzhin du ri rab kyi steng du bsgoms pas dpung sa'i 'og tu bying bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having meditated on them on the crown of the heads of the armies, as before, on the top of Mount Meru, the armies will sink into the ground.

original: gal te khro bo rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par bsams na 'bros par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te khro bo rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par bsams na 'bros par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one imagines that the wrathful ones turn their backs, they will flee.

original: gal te dpung phyir log nas lha mdun gyis bltas na rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te dpung phyir log nas lha mdun gyis bltas na rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the army turns back and faces the deity, they will be paralyzed.

original: gnyis ka mdun gyis bltas na pha rol po brgyal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka mdun gyis bltas na pha rol po brgyal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If both face each other, the opponent will faint.

original: de bas na sbyor ba'i nus pa yang //
analyzed: de bas na sbyor ba'i nus pa yang //
translated: Therefore, the power of the application

original: sangs rgyas dpung yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dpung yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: is taught by “even the army of the buddhas,” and so on.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni rdo rje gsum mo //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni rdo rje gsum mo //
translated: The three vajras of body, speech, and mind are the three vajras.

original: de las byung ba khro bo rnams so //
analyzed: de las byung ba khro bo rnams so //
translated: The wrathful ones arise from them.

original: de dpung thams cad de pha rol gyi sde bdag gi phyogs su gnon pa'o //
analyzed: de dpung thams cad de pha rol gyi sde bdag gi phyogs su gnon pa'o //
translated: That is the entire army, the enemy's army, which is pressed down on one's side.

original: de gnon pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gnon pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That pressing down is so called.

original: dpung phur bus gdab pa gsungs pa dgra bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dpung phur bus gdab pa gsungs pa dgra bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The statement of the stake of the army is the enemy, etc.

original: dgra po zhes pa ni pha rol gyi dpung ngo //
analyzed: dgra po zhes pa ni pha rol gyi dpung ngo //
translated: The enemy is the army of the opponent.

original: bskrad pa'i dus zhes pa ni rmongs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bskrad pa'i dus zhes pa ni rmongs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The time of driving out is for the purpose of confusing.

original: bsam gtan 'og nas 'byung ba 'dis sangs rgyas dag gis kyang las ma byas na 'gas par 'gyur zhes phul du byung ba'i phan yon no //
analyzed: bsam gtan 'og nas 'byung ba 'dis sangs rgyas dag gis kyang las ma byas na 'gas par 'gyur zhes phul du byung ba'i phan yon no //
translated: Even the Buddhas cannot undo it if it is done with this concentration that will be stated below is the excellent benefit.

original: @69a * // ji ltar zhe na h'um las zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: @69a * // ji ltar zhe na h'um las zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: How? From HŪM, etc.

original: de yang h'um las gyur pa'i phur bu bsam gtan gyis bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: de yang h'um las gyur pa'i phur bu bsam gtan gyis bsgom pa ni /
translated: Moreover, the stake that arises from HŪM is cultivated by concentration.

original: rtse mo lnga pa'i tshad du steng rtse lnga pa 'og rtse gcig pa tshad sor brgyad pa bsams te /
analyzed: rtse mo lnga pa'i tshad du steng rtse lnga pa 'og rtse gcig pa tshad sor brgyad pa bsams te /
translated: It is eight fingerbreadths in size, with five upper points and one lower point.

original: ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kyi snying gar rdo rje phur bu des btab cing khro bas gha gha gha ta'i phreng ba'i sngags bzlas shing thams cad la phog par bsams pas /
analyzed: ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kyi snying gar rdo rje phur bu des btab cing khro bas gha gha gha ta'i phreng ba'i sngags bzlas shing thams cad la phog par bsams pas /
translated: Thinking that all are struck by the mantra string of GHA GHA GHA T, recited wrathfully,

original: sangs rgyas kyi dpung dag kyang 'jig na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dpung dag kyang 'jig na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes so //
translated: if even the Buddha's armies are destroyed, what need is there to mention others?

original: rmongs par byed pa ni 'chi ba 'am rgol mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: rmongs par byed pa ni 'chi ba 'am rgol mi nus pa'o //
translated: Bewilderment means death or inability to resist.

original: da ni zhi ba'i las kyi rim pa gang zag mang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba gzhil pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni zhi ba'i las kyi rim pa gang zag mang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba gzhil pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the procedure for pacifying the harm of many people is taught:

original: grong ngam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: grong ngam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The procedure for pacifying the harm of many people is taught: In a village, town, country, or region, and so on.

original: khyim lnga phan chad grong zhes bya /
analyzed: khyim lnga phan chad grong zhes bya /
translated: More than five houses is called a village.

original: brgya phan chad la grong khyer ro //
analyzed: brgya phan chad la grong khyer ro //
translated: More than a hundred is a town.

original: gro lam tsam du 'dab chags su gnas pa la ljongs zhes bya'o //🔽nad kun spong pa'i zhi ba yang //
analyzed: gro lam tsam du 'dab chags su gnas pa la ljongs zhes bya'o // nad kun spong pa'i zhi ba yang //
translated: A region is a place where people live scattered about, like a road.🔽Pacification is the abandonment of all diseases.

original: zhes pa ni sems can de na gnas pa kun gyi nad spangs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni sems can de na gnas pa kun gyi nad spangs pa ste /
translated: All the diseases of the sentient beings living there are abandoned.

original: sbyor ba 'dis rtag tu sbyar bar bya zhes so //
analyzed: sbyor ba 'dis rtag tu sbyar bar bya zhes so //
translated: One should always apply with this application.

original: sbyor ba de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: sbyor ba de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He declares just that application:

original: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽de yang nad kyis gang ba'i sems can rnams kyi gnas kyi bar snang gi phyogs su h'um las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa bum pa la rtag pa'i 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i bskal pa sreg pa lta bu'i 'od🔽zer 'phro ba bsams nas zhi ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'od zer gyis 'gro ba'i nad rnam par bsregs te 'od zer de nyid slar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o // de yang nad kyis gang ba'i sems can rnams kyi gnas kyi bar snang gi phyogs su h'um las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa bum pa la rtag pa'i 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i bskal pa sreg pa lta bu'i 'od zer 'phro ba bsams nas zhi ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'od zer gyis 'gro ba'i nad rnam par bsregs te 'od zer de nyid slar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: The vajra, etc.

original: de nas spyan ma'i sngags bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i nor bu rin chen te /
analyzed: de nas spyan ma'i sngags bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i nor bu rin chen te /
translated: Moreover, one should imagine the five Tathagatas in the form of a five-pointed vajra, arisen from the syllable hum, in the space above the location of those sentient beings who are afflicted with disease, with the light of the fire of destruction at the end of the cosmic age, together with the wheel of the perpetual vase, and then the yogin, reciting the mantra of pacification, should burn up the disease of the world with the light rays, and he should again gather back that light ray.

original: spyan ma la sogs pa bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin pa'i 'od zer rnams spro ba dag kyang bya'o //
analyzed: spyan ma la sogs pa bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin pa'i 'od zer rnams spro ba dag kyang bya'o //
translated: Then the yogin, reciting the mantra of Locana, should emit the light rays of Locana, etc., holding vases of nectar.

original: des 'od zer dbab pa dang dbang bskur ba yang stsol lo zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: des 'od zer dbab pa dang dbang bskur ba yang stsol lo zhes sbyar ro //
translated: One should understand that he also bestows the descent of the light rays and the conferral of initiation.

original: de 'ba' zhig ma yin te rdo rje gsum gyis dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: de 'ba' zhig ma yin te rdo rje gsum gyis dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Not only that, one should be conferred initiation by the three vajras.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares this, beginning with “buddhas.”

original: sangs rgyas sprin rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprin rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshogs so //
translated: “Clouds of buddhas” is a group of Vairocanas.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod pa'i tshogs so //
translated: “Vajrasattvas” is a group of Akṣobhyas.

original: chos kyi brjod pa'i zhes pa ni @69b 'od dpag med kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: chos kyi brjod pa'i zhes pa ni @69b 'od dpag med kyi tshogs so //
translated: “Dharma-utterers” is a group of Amitābha.

original: de rnams kyang bdud rtsi'i bum pa bzung bas 'od zer dbab pa dang dbang bskur bstan par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de rnams kyang bdud rtsi'i bum pa bzung bas 'od zer dbab pa dang dbang bskur bstan par bya'o zhes so //
translated: One should understand that they also bestow the descent of the light rays and the conferral of initiation by holding the vase of nectar.

original: de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas par gsungs pa /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares that by doing so, one becomes a buddha,

original: rdo rje bsam gtan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsam gtan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with “vajra-meditation.”

original: dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs //
analyzed: dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs //
translated: “One should also fill the difficult-to-fill.”

original: zhes pa ni nyams stobs dang bang mdzod la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni nyams stobs dang bang mdzod la sogs pa'o //
translated: This refers to the strength of experience, the treasury, and so forth.

original: des kyang sbyin pa'i char 'bebs pas na /
analyzed: des kyang sbyin pa'i char 'bebs pas na /
translated: Since one also causes a rain of generosity by that,

original: yid bzhin nor bu dang 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu dang 'drar 'gyur //
translated: It becomes like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: zhes so // de'i phan yon gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // de'i phan yon gsungs pa /
translated: The benefits of that are stated:

original: bskal pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bskal pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In an eon, etc.

original: gsang ba rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bo bas gsal ba'i sku ste lha rnams so //
analyzed: gsang ba rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bo bas gsal ba'i sku ste lha rnams so //
translated: The secret is the nature of the three vajras, the body of clear light, the deities.

original: de nyid kyis na skyon med pa ste gzung 'dzin dang bral pa ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na skyon med pa ste gzung 'dzin dang bral pa ji snyed pa'o //
translated: By that alone, it is flawless, free from subject and object, as much as possible.

original: sems can ni grong la sogs pa na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sems can ni grong la sogs pa na gnas pa'o //
translated: Sentient beings are those dwelling in towns, etc.

original: de'i nad thams cad med pa ni sbyor ba de'o //
analyzed: de'i nad thams cad med pa ni sbyor ba de'o //
translated: The absence of all their illnesses is that application.

original: bar snang gi rdo rje las byung bas na de skad do //
analyzed: bar snang gi rdo rje las byung bas na de skad do //
translated: Since it arises from the vajra in space, it is so called.

original: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phur bus bgegs kyi 'tshe ba bzlog pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phur bus bgegs kyi 'tshe ba bzlog pa gsungs pa /
translated: The averting of the harm of obstructors by the dagger of Amṛtakuṇḍali is stated:

original: yid dam bcas ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yid dam bcas ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Having made a mental commitment, etc.

original: yid dam bcas pa rdzogs nas kyang //
analyzed: yid dam bcas pa rdzogs nas kyang //
translated: Having completed the mental commitment,

original: zhes pa ni gong du yul gyi 'tshe ba nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i sbyor ba rdzogs pas //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gong du yul gyi 'tshe ba nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i sbyor ba rdzogs pas //
translated: since the application of thoroughly pacifying the harm of the object above is complete,

original: gal te glo bur du nye bar 'tshe ba byung na sngags kyi gnas su spyad par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: gal te glo bur du nye bar 'tshe ba byung na sngags kyi gnas su spyad par bya'o zhes so //
translated: If there is a sudden calamity, one should practice in a place of mantra.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, “vajra amṛta” and so forth.

original: de yang rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de yang rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid rdo rje ste /
translated: Moreover, it is a vajra because of the very vajra amṛta-cakra.

original: phur bu sku stod zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa'i bdag nyid la sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa'i gzugs su rab tu bsgoms la gdab pa'i sngags kyis gang yang rung bar btab pas de las me stag 'bar ba'i 'od 'phros pas /
analyzed: phur bu sku stod zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa'i bdag nyid la sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa'i gzugs su rab tu bsgoms la gdab pa'i sngags kyis gang yang rung bar btab pas de las me stag 'bar ba'i 'od 'phros pas /
translated: Having fully contemplated the form of the upper body with three faces and six arms, and the lower body in the form of a three-sided iron dagger, one should strike with the mantra of striking. From that, a blazing spark of light radiates,

original: de nyid de las gyur pas phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad la gdab bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid de las gyur pas phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad la gdab bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: and from that, one should strike the hosts of obstructors abiding in the maṇḍalas of the ten directions.

original: sa bsrung ba la yang de ltar ro //
analyzed: sa bsrung ba la yang de ltar ro //
translated: It is the same for protecting the ground.

original: bsam gtan gyi bsrung ba la ni h'um las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bskyed nas mtshams kyi phyi rol du gtams bar bsam mo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi bsrung ba la ni h'um las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bskyed nas mtshams kyi phyi rol du gtams bar bsam mo //
translated: For the protection of concentration, having generated with light rays arisen from hūṃ, one should imagine that they fill the outer boundary.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi las byed pa las mi 'da' bas na rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi las byed pa las mi 'da' bas na rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //
translated: Since he does not transgress the action of the three vajras, he is the pledge of the three vajras, which is Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: skye 'gro ni khyab 'jug la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye 'gro ni khyab 'jug la sogs pa'o //
translated: Living beings are Viṣṇu and so forth.

original: de gang gis gdul byar @70a * //
analyzed: de gang gis gdul byar @70a * //
translated: By what does he tame them?

original: byed pa nyid snying rje ste bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phur bu'o //
analyzed: byed pa nyid snying rje ste bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phur bu'o //
translated: Compassion is the stake of Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That samādhi is called that.

original: da ni rtag pa'i rnal 'byor pas zhi ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rtag pa'i rnal 'byor pas zhi ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the yoga of permanence is stated:

original: mdangs bzang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mdangs bzang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The rite of pacification is stated with “good complexion,” and so forth.

original: de yang gong du gsungs pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsrung ba'i nang du /
analyzed: de yang gong du gsungs pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsrung ba'i nang du /
translated: Moreover, the yoga practitioner who has performed the procedure as previously stated, within the protection wheel,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su gzhal yas khang pa rnam par bsams nas /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su gzhal yas khang pa rnam par bsams nas /
translated: having imagined the celestial mansion in the middle of the realm of space,

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa las gyur pa'i rnam par snad mdzad kyi gzugs kha dog dkar po mdangs bzang ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa las gyur pa'i rnam par snad mdzad kyi gzugs kha dog dkar po mdangs bzang ste /
translated: the form of Akṣobhya arisen from Vajradhara, white in color, with a good complexion,

original: zla ba'i dbus su bsams nas de'i cho ga rdzogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang de bzhin du bsams nas /
analyzed: zla ba'i dbus su bsams nas de'i cho ga rdzogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang de bzhin du bsams nas /
translated: Having visualized the moon in the middle of the moon, one should visualize the wheel of the mandala in the same way, by completing the rite.

original: bdag gi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar zla ba la 'dod pa gzhag ces te /
analyzed: bdag gi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar zla ba la 'dod pa gzhag ces te /
translated: One should place the moon in the heart of the gnosis-being of oneself, and on that moon, one should place the object of desire.

original: zhi ba'i yul nad la sogs pa zhi bar 'dod pas gzhag par bya'o zhes /
analyzed: zhi ba'i yul nad la sogs pa zhi bar 'dod pas gzhag par bya'o zhes /
translated: One should place the object of desire, such as the pacification of illness, in the case of the rite of pacification.

original: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i spyan ma'i sngags yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang ldan par bzlas pa 'am /
analyzed: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i spyan ma'i sngags yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang ldan par bzlas pa 'am /
translated: Then, one should recite the mantra of Locanā, which will be given below, together with the three syllables, and together with the name of the person for whose sake one is performing the rite.

original: de bzhin du mtshan sngags sam sa bon bzlas pas spyan ma la sogs pas nam mkha'i dbyings gang bar bsgom mo //
analyzed: de bzhin du mtshan sngags sam sa bon bzlas pas spyan ma la sogs pas nam mkha'i dbyings gang bar bsgom mo //
translated: Or, one should recite the name mantra or the seed syllable of Locanā, and so on, and meditate on them filling the realm of space.

original: de rnams 'od zer lnga'i gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas nad pa'i lus la 'od zer de dbab par byas pas nad bsal zhing yan lag rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams 'od zer lnga'i gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas nad pa'i lus la 'od zer de dbab par byas pas nad bsal zhing yan lag rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those [deities] are gathered in the form of a mass of five-colored light rays, and one should cause those light rays to descend into the body of the patient. By that, the illness is removed and the limbs are extended.

original: yang aom a'a: dzin dzik che ge mo sh'antim ku ru h'um sv'ah'a zhes pa 'am sa bon bzlas pas ba spu'i bu gnas sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprin rnams spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang aom a'a: dzin dzik che ge mo sh'antim ku ru h'um sv'ah'a zhes pa 'am sa bon bzlas pas ba spu'i bu gnas sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprin rnams spro bar bya'o //
translated: Again, with “Oṃ āḥ jinajik such-and-such, pacify, pacify, hūṃ svāhā,” or with the seed-syllable, one should emit clouds of the Buddha Vairocana from the pores of one’s body.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sprin rnams kyis de'i tshe phyag na bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis bkang pa'i bum pa 'dzin pas de la phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur rab tu stsol zhes so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sprin rnams kyis de'i tshe phyag na bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis bkang pa'i bum pa 'dzin pas de la phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur rab tu stsol zhes so //
translated: At that time, the clouds of Buddhas, holding vases filled with the stream of nectar in their hands, confer the consecration on him in order to make him irreversible.

original: nad zhi pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: nad zhi pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only does this pacify disease,

original: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: one becomes glorious and vajra-like.

original: zhes so // sangs rgyas ni rtag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // sangs rgyas ni rtag pa'o //
translated: The Buddha is eternal.

original: dam tshig ni spyan ma'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni spyan ma'o //
translated: The commitment is Locanā.

original: bkod pa ni mang po 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: bkod pa ni mang po 'dus pa'o //
translated: The array is the assembly of many.

original: snying rje'i rlan yod pas na sprin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje'i rlan yod pas na sprin zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it is moist with compassion, it is called “cloud.”

original: 'od dpag med kyis rgyas par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'od dpag med kyis rgyas par bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: Amitābha’s expansion is stated:

original: nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Space” and so forth.

original: de yang gong ma ltar khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du lam las dbang @70b chen gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa kha dog ser por bsams la /🔽de'i steng du nyi ma la chos 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: de yang gong ma ltar khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du lam las dbang @70b chen gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa kha dog ser por bsams la / de'i steng du nyi ma la chos 'dzin pa ste /
translated: Furthermore, as above, one should imagine a square maṇḍala of the great lord of the path in the interior of the kūṭāgāra, yellow in color.

original: snang ba mtha' yas gong ma ltar 'khor lo dang ldan pa kha dog dmar por bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas gong ma ltar 'khor lo dang ldan pa kha dog dmar por bsam par bya'o //
translated: On top of that, one should imagine a red wheel of Dharma-dhara, Amitābha as above, on a sun.

original: de'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar zla ba la 'dod pa gzhag ces te tshe dang chos dang nor rgyas par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar zla ba la 'dod pa gzhag ces te tshe dang chos dang nor rgyas par 'dod pa'o //
translated: One should imagine the gnosis-being at the heart of that, with a moon and a dhīḥ.

original: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i gos dkar mo'i sngags la sogs pa bzlas pas nam mkha'i khams na bza' dkar mo la sogs pas gang ba'o //
analyzed: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i gos dkar mo'i sngags la sogs pa bzlas pas nam mkha'i khams na bza' dkar mo la sogs pas gang ba'o //
translated: Then, one should recite the mantra of Pāṇḍaravāsinī, and so on, that will be given below, filling the realm of space with Pāṇḍaravāsinīs, and so on.

original: de rnams kyang 'od kyi gong bus bsdus na yid bzhin nor bu ste zhes so //
analyzed: de rnams kyang 'od kyi gong bus bsdus na yid bzhin nor bu ste zhes so //
translated: Those also are collected into a ball of light, which is the wish-fulfilling gem.

original: ji ltar sdud na /
analyzed: ji ltar sdud na /
translated: How is it collected?

original: lus dang ngag sems gnas la zhes te spyi po dang mgrin pa dang / snying gar bsdu zhing 'dod pa 'od zer de la gzhag par byas pas thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag sems gnas la zhes te spyi po dang mgrin pa dang / snying gar bsdu zhing 'dod pa 'od zer de la gzhag par byas pas thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are in the place, that is, in the head, throat, and heart, and are gathered there, and the desire is placed in that light ray, and everything is expanded.

original: yang aom a'a: a'a ro li ka che ge mo pushtim ku ru h'um zhes pa'i sngags sam /🔽sa bon bzlas pas ba spu'i bu gnas rin chen zhes rin po che'i char 'bebs pa ste /
analyzed: yang aom a'a: a'a ro li ka che ge mo pushtim ku ru h'um zhes pa'i sngags sam / sa bon bzlas pas ba spu'i bu gnas rin chen zhes rin po che'i char 'bebs pa ste /
translated: Again, one should repeat the mantra Om Ah Arolikah so-and-so's pustim kuru Hum,

original: snang ba mtha' yas kyi sprin spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas kyi sprin spro bar bya'o //
translated: or the seed syllable, and a rain of jewels falls from the pores of the body, and one should emit clouds of Amitabha.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: spros te chos sku zhes te snang ba mtha' yas de nyid rgyas par byed pas na de rnam par bsgoms nas chos kyi sprin des bdud rtsis bkang ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa de la zad pa med par bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur rab tu stsol zhes so //
analyzed: spros te chos sku zhes te snang ba mtha' yas de nyid rgyas par byed pas na de rnam par bsgoms nas chos kyi sprin des bdud rtsis bkang ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa de la zad pa med par bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur rab tu stsol zhes so //
translated: Having emitted, the Dharma body, that is, Amitabha, expands, and having meditated on that, with that cloud of Dharma, holding a vase filled with nectar, in order to make it inexhaustible, bestow the consecration.

original: de ltar byas na bkra shis par 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar byas na bkra shis par 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
translated: If one does it that way, it is said, it will be auspicious.

original: rdo rje bsam gtan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsam gtan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra contemplation and so forth.

original: chos kyi sprin ni snang pa mtha' yas so //
analyzed: chos kyi sprin ni snang pa mtha' yas so //
translated: The cloud of Dharma is Amitābha.

original: dam tshig ni dkar mo'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni dkar mo'o //
translated: The pledge is Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: de mang po 'dus pa ni bkod pa'o //
analyzed: de mang po 'dus pa ni bkod pa'o //
translated: The array is the assembly of many of them.

original: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas dbang du byed par 'dod pa la nus pa sbyin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas dbang du byed par 'dod pa la nus pa sbyin pa gsungs pa /
translated: For the yogin of Amoghasiddhi who desires to enthrall, the bestowal of power is stated:

original: nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The sky and so forth.

original: de yang gong ma ltar khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus su gnas pa rdo rje dkyil 'khor zla gam bsam zhes pa ni zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa lta bu'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang gong ma ltar khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus su gnas pa rdo rje dkyil 'khor zla gam bsam zhes pa ni zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa lta bu'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni ma yin no //
translated: Also, as above, in the center of the kūṭāgāra, one should imagine a vajra maṇḍala, a crescent moon is a sun maṇḍala in the form of a half-moon, not an air maṇḍala.

original: de gong ma ltar rdo rje mkha' zhes pa ni don yod grub pa ste /
analyzed: de gong ma ltar rdo rje mkha' zhes pa ni don yod grub pa ste /
translated: As above, the vajra space is Amoghasiddhi.

original: chos mchog gzugs zhes pa ni snang ba mtha' yas ltar 'khor lo dang ldan pa dmar por bsams nas /
analyzed: chos mchog gzugs zhes pa ni snang ba mtha' yas ltar 'khor lo dang ldan pa dmar por bsams nas /
translated: Having imagined the supreme Dharma form, that is, a red wheel, as Amitābha,

original: de'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar gzhan dbang du byed par 'dod pa ni @71a * //
analyzed: de'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar gzhan dbang du byed par 'dod pa ni @71a * //
translated: in the heart of the gnosis being is the one who desires to enthrall another.

original: gzhag par bya zhes so //
analyzed: gzhag par bya zhes so //
translated: One should say, I will place it.

original: de nas aom a'a:pradzny'a dhrik che ge mo'i ba sham r'a ga pa sham ku ru h'um ho:zhes brjod pas ba spu'i bu ga las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad yongs su gang bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de nas aom a'a:pradzny'a dhrik che ge mo'i ba sham r'a ga pa sham ku ru h'um ho:zhes brjod pas ba spu'i bu ga las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad yongs su gang bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: Then, by saying Oṃ āḥ prajñādhṛk, O such-and-such, make the desire of my heart come true, hūṃ hoḥ, the entire realm of space is filled with the forms of buddhas and bodhisattvas emerging from the pores of one's body.

original: de rnams kyang 'od zer lnga'i sbyor ba yis /
analyzed: de rnams kyang 'od zer lnga'i sbyor ba yis /
translated: Those [buddhas and bodhisattvas] also, by the yoga of five-colored light rays,

original: gang zag de la gzi brjid dbab par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: gang zag de la gzi brjid dbab par bya'o zhes so //
translated: should cause splendor to descend upon that person.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What will happen by that?

original: de ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said, Then, and so forth.

original: las thabs byed par zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i las kun gzhan gyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: las thabs byed par zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i las kun gzhan gyis byed pa'o //
translated: The statement one should perform the rite of service means that all desired activities are performed by others.

original: dga' bas myos pa'i dbang po ni brgyal ba'o //
analyzed: dga' bas myos pa'i dbang po ni brgyal ba'o //
translated: The statement the faculties intoxicated with joy means fainting.

original: de dgyes nas las thabs chen po yang rab tu gsol zhes so //
analyzed: de dgyes nas las thabs chen po yang rab tu gsol zhes so //
translated: Having pleased them, one should request the great rite of service.

original: de bzhin du bud med la sogs pa bskul ba ma byas kyang mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: de bzhin du bud med la sogs pa bskul ba ma byas kyang mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur zhes so //
translated: Similarly, it is said, Even without being urged, women and so forth will be under one's control merely by seeing them.

original: rin po che ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The jewel is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de'i dam tshig ni sgrol ma'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni sgrol ma'o //
translated: His pledge is Tārā.

original: de'i sprin bkod pa ni gong ma ltar ro //
analyzed: de'i sprin bkod pa ni gong ma ltar ro //
translated: Her cloud array is as above.

original: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i mngon spyod dang 'brel ba'i las gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i mngon spyod dang 'brel ba'i las gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the rites connected with the previously mentioned violence are stated,

original: nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with “space” and so on.

original: de yang sangs rgyas kyi sku zhi ba'i bye brag gis bsdus pa rnams slar spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: de yang sangs rgyas kyi sku zhi ba'i bye brag gis bsdus pa rnams slar spro bar bya ste /
translated: Moreover, one should expand the forms of the Buddhas, which are included in the category of peaceful forms.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /🔽skra 'greng pa ro langs kyi gri dang ka p'a la 'dzin pa'i srin po dang lus la sogs pa rno zhing tsha ba'i khro bo drag cing gtum po dang / de bzhin du sgra 'byin pa'i wa dang bya rog sna tshogs dang / bya rgod lcags kyi mchu can dang /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na / skra 'greng pa ro langs kyi gri dang ka p'a la 'dzin pa'i srin po dang lus la sogs pa rno zhing tsha ba'i khro bo drag cing gtum po dang / de bzhin du sgra 'byin pa'i wa dang bya rog sna tshogs dang / bya rgod lcags kyi mchu can dang /
translated: How so?🔽One should meditate on the wrathful ones, fierce and violent, with hair bristling, holding the knife and skull-cup of a zombie, and so on, sharp and hot, and likewise on the howling jackals and crows, and on the vultures with iron beaks,

original: khyi lcags kyi mche ba can gyis gang bar bsgom zhes so //
analyzed: khyi lcags kyi mche ba can gyis gang bar bsgom zhes so //
translated: and on the dogs with iron fangs.

original: des bskal pa'i me bzhin du 'bar ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum la gnas pa sangs rgyas kun la gnod pa byed pa'i 'og nas 'byung ba ltar bsams nas /
analyzed: des bskal pa'i me bzhin du 'bar ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum la gnas pa sangs rgyas kun la gnod pa byed pa'i 'og nas 'byung ba ltar bsams nas /
translated: Having contemplated the blazing fire, like the fire at the end of the eon, abiding in the triangular maṇḍala, harming all buddhas, as will be explained below,

original: skrag cing 'jigs pa'i bsgrub bya kha sbyar ba byas pas srog bye ba skra grol ba snum gyis byugs pa gzi brjid dang bral ba la bsams nas rnal 'byor 'di sbyar bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: skrag cing 'jigs pa'i bsgrub bya kha sbyar ba byas pas srog bye ba skra grol ba snum gyis byugs pa gzi brjid dang bral ba la bsams nas rnal 'byor 'di sbyar bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: the practitioner should perform the union with the victim who is frightened and terrified, imagining that the life force of ten million beings, with loose hair, anointed with oil, and devoid of splendor, is being drawn out.

original: de las dang mthun pa'i sngags bzlas pas gong ma lta bu spros pas de de rnams kyis mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pas gcod par byed cing rgyu ma la sogs pa thams cad drangs par bsgoms pas dkon mchog la gnod pa byed pa'i dgra rnams 'chi zhes so
analyzed: de las dang mthun pa'i sngags bzlas pas gong ma lta bu spros pas de de rnams kyis mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pas gcod par byed cing rgyu ma la sogs pa thams cad drangs par bsgoms pas dkon mchog la gnod pa byed pa'i dgra rnams 'chi zhes so
translated: Through the recitation of the mantra that is consistent with that, as before, one should imagine that the victim is being cut up by those beings, who are brandishing various weapons, and that all of his entrails and so forth are being pulled out.

original: // de @71b nas bar srid drangs pa la sogs pas mi bskyod par bskyed nas srung ma gtad pa la sogs pa byas pas mngon dga' skye bar 'gyur bas na gnyis ka dag pa'o //
analyzed: // de @71b nas bar srid drangs pa la sogs pas mi bskyod par bskyed nas srung ma gtad pa la sogs pa byas pas mngon dga' skye bar 'gyur bas na gnyis ka dag pa'o //
translated: Then, having generated the intermediate existence, which is not shaken by being drawn out and so forth, and having given the protection, and so forth, one is born in Abhirati. Thus, both are pure.

original: sbyor ba de'i nus pa yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: sbyor ba de'i nus pa yang gsungs pa /
translated: The power of that union is also stated:

original: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, etc.

original: rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The vajra is Akshobhya.

original: de'i dam tshig ni rigs las byung ba'i srin po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni rigs las byung ba'i srin po la sogs pa'o //
translated: His pledge is the rakshasa, etc. born from the family.

original: de'i sprin bkod pa ni gong ma ltar te /
analyzed: de'i sprin bkod pa ni gong ma ltar te /
translated: The array of clouds of that is as above.

original: de las byed pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de las byed pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one who does that is so called.

original: da ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i zhal la sogs pa bshad pa dran par bya ba dang / ma bshad pa rnams bshad par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i zhal la sogs pa bshad pa dran par bya ba dang / ma bshad pa rnams bshad par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to recall the explanation of the faces, etc. of Vairochana, etc. and to explain those not explained, he says:

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Vairochana, etc.

original: ston ka'i 'dam bu zhes pa chu'i sgo ba'o //
analyzed: ston ka'i 'dam bu zhes pa chu'i sgo ba'o //
translated: The autumn lotus is a water lily.

original: rdo rje can ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The vajra-holder is Akshobhya.

original: zhe sdang gi rang bzhin pas na 'jig rten khams rnams 'khrug byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi rang bzhin pas na 'jig rten khams rnams 'khrug byed pa'o //
translated: Since he has the nature of hatred, he agitates the worlds.

original: 'dod chags can ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: 'dod chags can ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: The one with passion is Amitābha.

original: 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin bas na longs spyod can zhes so //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin bas na longs spyod can zhes so //
translated: Since he has the nature of passion, he is the one with enjoyments.

original: de rnams kyi g-yas par ma'i mtshan ma gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyi g-yas par ma'i mtshan ma gsungs pa /
translated: To the right of those, he declares the signs of the mothers.

original: 'khor lo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The wheel, etc.

original: de rnams kyang phyag drug pa bsgoms zhes so //
analyzed: de rnams kyang phyag drug pa bsgoms zhes so //
translated: They also are meditated on as having six arms.

original: bzang po mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams //
analyzed: bzang po mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams //
translated: The good one holds various weapons.

original: zhes pa ni le'u dang por bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni le'u dang por bshad pa'o //
translated: This is explained in the first chapter.

original: 'dir sangs rgyas gsum po nyid gsungs pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid gtso bor bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir sangs rgyas gsum po nyid gsungs pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid gtso bor bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the three buddhas are declared because the body, speech, and mind are taught as the principal [topics].

original: de bas na gnyis po yang le'u dang po las bshad pa ltar shes par bya'o //🔽spyan ma la sogs pa'i gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bas na gnyis po yang le'u dang po las bshad pa ltar shes par bya'o // spyan ma la sogs pa'i gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, the other two should be understood as explained in the first chapter.🔽The speech of Locanā, etc.

original: spyan ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: spyan ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: is declared by “Locanā,” etc.

original: phan pa zhes pa ni byams pa'i rang bzhin pas so //
analyzed: phan pa zhes pa ni byams pa'i rang bzhin pas so //
translated: The beneficial one is the nature of love.

original: mdzos pa'i gzugs ni lha'i bu mo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing 'jo sgeg gi ros rnam par brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: mdzos pa'i gzugs ni lha'i bu mo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing 'jo sgeg gi ros rnam par brgyan pa'o //
translated: The form of the one who is born from the seed syllable is the attire of a divine maiden, adorned with the relish of grace.

original: mkhas skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che //
analyzed: mkhas skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che //
translated: The one born from the face is the great queen.

original: zhes pa de bzhin nyid las byung ba'i lha mo'i shes bya'i rnam pa mkhyen par byed pa'i phyir m'a ma k'i'o //
analyzed: zhes pa de bzhin nyid las byung ba'i lha mo'i shes bya'i rnam pa mkhyen par byed pa'i phyir m'a ma k'i'o //
translated: Thus, because the goddess who arises from suchness causes one to know the aspects of objects of knowledge, she is Mamaki.

original: de bzhin du sku gsum las zhal gsum 'byung ba'i lha mos shes bya'i rnam par shes par byed pas na zhal skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che ste gos dkar mo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sku gsum las zhal gsum 'byung ba'i lha mos shes bya'i rnam par shes par byed pas na zhal skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che ste gos dkar mo'o //
translated: Similarly, because the goddess who arises from the three faces of the three bodies causes one to know the aspects of objects of knowledge, she is the one born from the face, the great queen, Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: bzang mo 'phags ma sgrol ma'o //
analyzed: bzang mo 'phags ma sgrol ma'o //
translated: The good one is noble Tārā.

original: rdo rje mtshan pa'i autpala bsnams pa'o//
analyzed: rdo rje mtshan pa'i autpala bsnams pa'o//
translated: She holds a lotus marked with a vajra.

original: @72a * // gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa ni le'u dang por shes par bya'o //
analyzed: @72a * // gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa ni le'u dang por shes par bya'o //
translated: Rūpavajrā and so on should be understood from the first chapter.

original: khro bo bzhi'i gsungs pa /
analyzed: khro bo bzhi'i gsungs pa /
translated: The four wrathful ones are stated:

original: khro bo chen po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo chen po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The great wrathful one and so on.

original: drag po zhes pa ni zhal rgod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: drag po zhes pa ni zhal rgod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The fierce one is the one with a wrathful face and so on.

original: drag po 'jigs pa ni lha chen po'o //
analyzed: drag po 'jigs pa ni lha chen po'o //
translated: The fierce one to be feared is the great god.

original: de 'jigs par byed pa ni gshin rje gshed po'o //
analyzed: de 'jigs par byed pa ni gshin rje gshed po'o //
translated: The one who terrifies him is Yamântaka.

original: drag tu bzhad pa'i sgra gsang mtho ba sgrogs pas thub pa'i dbang po skrag par byed cing ri rab kyang sgyel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: drag tu bzhad pa'i sgra gsang mtho ba sgrogs pas thub pa'i dbang po skrag par byed cing ri rab kyang sgyel bar byed pa'o //
translated: With a loud, fierce, and resounding laugh, he frightens the Lord of Sages and overthrows Mount Meru.

original: sbyor ba can zhes pa ni rnal 'byor dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: sbyor ba can zhes pa ni rnal 'byor dang ldan pas so //
translated: The one who is endowed with yoga is the one who possesses yoga.

original: rdo rje mi 'chi zhes pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mi 'chi zhes pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //
translated: Vajra immortality is Amrtakundali.

original: 'joms pa myur ba'i dpe ;
analyzed: 'joms pa myur ba'i dpe ;
translated: The example of quick destruction.

original: drag po 'khor lo 'bar ba 'dra //
analyzed: drag po 'khor lo 'bar ba 'dra //
translated: Like the blazing wheel of Rudra.

original: zhes so // rang bzhin du gtogs pa'i khro bo rnams ni bsam gtan dang ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bsrung ba la dgod pa dang / las kyi khyad par la dgongs pa'i phyir na gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // rang bzhin du gtogs pa'i khro bo rnams ni bsam gtan dang ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bsrung ba la dgod pa dang / las kyi khyad par la dgongs pa'i phyir na gsungs pa /
translated: The wrathful ones belonging to the nature are taught for the protection of both the meditative and painted mandalas, and for the sake of the special activities.

original: takki'i rgyal po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: takki'i rgyal po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The king of Takkirâjas and so forth.

original: phyag bzhi zhes pa ni mtshan dang ldan pa smos pa'o //
analyzed: phyag bzhi zhes pa ni mtshan dang ldan pa smos pa'o //
translated: Four-armed refers to the one with the marks.

original: 'khor lo ste zhes pa ni myur bar gdug pa 'joms pa la dpa' ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ste zhes pa ni myur bar gdug pa 'joms pa la dpa' ba'o //
translated: The wheel refers to the one who is heroic in quickly destroying the wicked.

original: 'bar ba rnon po can du bsgom //
analyzed: 'bar ba rnon po can du bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the sharp one with blazing light.

original: zhes pa ni me'i 'od zer tsha zhing rno ba'i gzugs yod pa la de skad du /
analyzed: zhes pa ni me'i 'od zer tsha zhing rno ba'i gzugs yod pa la de skad du /
translated: The form of the light rays of fire is hot and sharp.

original: rdo rje las byung ba ni de'i rigs so //
analyzed: rdo rje las byung ba ni de'i rigs so //
translated: Arisen from the vajra is of its type.

original: zur gyis lta ba ni mig gcig zhi ba zhes pa ni gzhan la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: zur gyis lta ba ni mig gcig zhi ba zhes pa ni gzhan la ltos pa'o //
translated: Looking from the corner of the eye is one eye.

original: yi ge gcig ces pa ni gtsug tor bdun char sa bon gcig ste brum kho nas bskyed ces so //
analyzed: yi ge gcig ces pa ni gtsug tor bdun char sa bon gcig ste brum kho nas bskyed ces so //
translated: One syllable is the seed of all seven uṣṇīṣas, generated only by bhrūṃ.

original: shes rab mthar byed ni yi ge pram do //
analyzed: shes rab mthar byed ni yi ge pram do //
translated: Prajñānta is the syllable praṃ.

original: padma mthar byed ni yi ge ha'o //
analyzed: padma mthar byed ni yi ge ha'o //
translated: Padmānta is the syllable ha.

original: gzhan rnams ni h'um las bskyed pa'o//
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni h'um las bskyed pa'o//
translated: The others are generated from hūṃ.

original: rtse gcig pa rnam par bsams pas na bsam gtan dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rtse gcig pa rnam par bsams pas na bsam gtan dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The maṇḍala of meditation is the single-pointed thought of them.

original: de rnams la lnga ni mi bskyod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de rnams la lnga ni mi bskyod pa lta bu'o //
translated: Among them, five are like Akṣobhya.

original: gtsug tor ni rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o //🔽'dod pa'i rgyal po ni phyag na lcags kyu ral gri rin po che padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor ni rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o // 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni phyag na lcags kyu ral gri rin po che padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The uṣṇīṣa is like Ratnasaṃbhava.🔽Kāmarāja holds a hook, sword, jewel, and lotus.

original: dbyug pa sngon po ni dbyug pa ral gri rin po che padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: dbyug pa sngon po ni dbyug pa ral gri rin po che padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Nīladaṇḍa holds a club, sword, jewel, and lotus.

original: stobs po che gsal shing ral gri rin po che padma 'dzin pa'o //🔽mi g-yo mgon po ral gri rdo rje rin po che padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: stobs po che gsal shing ral gri rin po che padma 'dzin pa'o // mi g-yo mgon po ral gri rdo rje rin po che padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Mahābala holds a sword, a stake, and a jewel lotus.🔽Acala holds a sword, a vajra, and a jewel lotus.

original: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ral gri rin po che padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ral gri rin po che padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Uṣṇīṣa Cakravartin holds a sword, a jewel, and a lotus.

original: gnod mdzes rdo rje ral gri rin po che padma @72b 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: gnod mdzes rdo rje ral gri rin po che padma @72b 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Sumbha holds a vajra, a sword, and a jewel lotus.

original: de dag kyang 'gying bag tu khro ba mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa smar can rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa sgom pa'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang 'gying bag tu khro ba mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa smar can rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa sgom pa'o //
translated: They are all imagined to be wrathful in a flirtatious manner, with slightly bared fangs, and adorned with jeweled ornaments.

original: spyir khro bo de thams cad kyang sna tshogs padma'i steng na nyi ma'i gdan la g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang ba'i bar na sor nyi shu rtsa gnyis yod par bya'o zhes so//
analyzed: spyir khro bo de thams cad kyang sna tshogs padma'i steng na nyi ma'i gdan la g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang ba'i bar na sor nyi shu rtsa gnyis yod par bya'o zhes so//
translated: In general, all of those wrathful ones should be imagined to have twenty-two finger lengths between the right and left legs, on variegated lotuses, upon seats of suns.

original: 'di rnams kyi bdag po'i nges pa ni so so'i sgom khog 'og tu shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi bdag po'i nges pa ni so so'i sgom khog 'og tu shes par bya'o //
translated: The specific lords of these [deities] should be understood from the individual meditation manuals below.🔽In order to teach the previously mentioned “uṣṇīṣa pledge,”

original: gong du gsungs pa gtsug tor dam tshig ces pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gong du gsungs pa gtsug tor dam tshig ces pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: it is said:

original: gzi brjid phung po zhes ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gzi brjid phung po zhes ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The one called “Mass of Splendor” and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rang bzhin bas na gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rang bzhin bas na gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po'o //
translated: Since it is the nature of the light rays of all the Tathāgatas, it is the Uṣṇīṣa Mass of Splendor.

original: gang gis gnon par mi nus pa'i gtsug tor mnga' bas na gtsug tor rgyal po'o //
analyzed: gang gis gnon par mi nus pa'i gtsug tor mnga' bas na gtsug tor rgyal po'o //
translated: Since it has a crown protuberance that no one can suppress, it is the Uṣṇīṣa King.

original: gzhan yang sngags kyi 'khor lo can //
analyzed: gzhan yang sngags kyi 'khor lo can //
translated: Further, the one with the mantra wheel.

original: zhes pa ni 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i gtsug tor drug ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i gtsug tor drug ste /
translated: This refers to the six uṣṇīṣas that possess a wheel.

original: de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan nges pa ni dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan nges pa ni dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes par bya'o //
translated: The colors and implements of those should be known from the Śrī-vajra-hṛdaya-vyūha-tantra.

original: dam tshig spyod pa 'di rnams zhes pa ni bgegs kyi gnod pa srung pa las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa 'di rnams zhes pa ni bgegs kyi gnod pa srung pa las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: These commitments and practices, it is said, are for the purpose of protecting against harm from obstructors.

original: so so dag tu zhes pa ni 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba'i re re bsrung ba'i don du bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: so so dag tu zhes pa ni 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba'i re re bsrung ba'i don du bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
translated: In each case, it means that one should meditate for the purpose of protection by any one of these.

original: khro bo 'di rnams dang mthun pa'i gsang sngags dang sbyor ba ni rgyud gzhan las bshad pa yin zhes so //
analyzed: khro bo 'di rnams dang mthun pa'i gsang sngags dang sbyor ba ni rgyud gzhan las bshad pa yin zhes so //
translated: The secret mantra and yoga in accordance with these wrathful ones is explained in other tantras.

original: khro bo de rnams kyi che ba yang /
analyzed: khro bo de rnams kyi che ba yang /
translated: The greatness of those wrathful ones is as follows:

original: khro bo dag ni re re yang //
analyzed: khro bo dag ni re re yang //
translated: Each of the wrathful ones

original: sprul pa gzhan dang mthun par 'byung bas na //
analyzed: sprul pa gzhan dang mthun par 'byung bas na //
translated: arises in accordance with other emanations.

original: mkhas pas shin tu khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: mkhas pas shin tu khyad par 'phags //
translated: Therefore, the wise are very exalted.

original: zhes so// da ni 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor pas rdo rje 'dzin pa la byung ba'i rang gi lhas sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /🔽nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so// da ni 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor pas rdo rje 'dzin pa la byung ba'i rang gi lhas sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa / nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, the rite of the prior service of one's deity that occurs in the Vajra Holder is stated for the yogī of the desire deity.

original: de'i don ni 'di lta ste ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos ri la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas byi dor byas nas der bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di lta ste ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos ri la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas byi dor byas nas der bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: A practitioner who possesses the qualities as stated, having cleaned a pleasing place such as a mountain, and so on, sits there on a comfortable seat.

original: tha mal pa'i lus kyi snying gar zla ba sa bon bsgoms te /
analyzed: tha mal pa'i lus kyi snying gar zla ba sa bon bsgoms te /
translated: Meditating on the moon and seed syllable at the heart of the ordinary body,

original: de'i 'od zer gyis yul gsal bar byas nas tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi dmigs te rten gsal bar bya ba la sogs pa gzhan du mthong bas bsod @73a * //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyis yul gsal bar byas nas tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi dmigs te rten gsal bar bya ba la sogs pa gzhan du mthong bas bsod @73a * //
translated: Having illuminated the field with that light, one should visualize the four types of pure conduct, and so on, in order to illuminate the support, as seen elsewhere.

original: nams kyi tshogs bsags te /
analyzed: nams kyi tshogs bsags te /
translated: One should accumulate the collection of merit.

original: ye shes kyi tshogs kyi don du dmigs nas bgegs kyi tshogs dgag par byas nas /🔽der spyi gzugs gyur pa las nam mkha'i dbyings te /
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshogs kyi don du dmigs nas bgegs kyi tshogs dgag par byas nas / der spyi gzugs gyur pa las nam mkha'i dbyings te /
translated: For the sake of the collection of wisdom, one should visualize the obstruction of the assembly of obstructors.🔽In that place, one should visualize the celestial mansion arisen from the transformation of the universal form.

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su rtag pa las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa bsams pa'i dbus su gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor te zla ba'i gdan bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su rtag pa las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa bsams pa'i dbus su gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor te zla ba'i gdan bsam par bya'o //
translated: In the middle of the source of phenomena, one should visualize the clear maṇḍala, that is, the moon seat.

original: de'i steng du /
analyzed: de'i steng du /
translated: Upon that,

original: sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas //
translated: one should visualize the form of the Buddha.

original: zhes te / ye shes lngas dang po'i mgon po cho ga bzhis bskyed nas /
analyzed: zhes te / ye shes lngas dang po'i mgon po cho ga bzhis bskyed nas /
translated: Having generated the lord of the first [Buddha] with the five pristine consciousnesses through the four rites,

original: des 'gro ba rnams sngags kyi snod rud bar bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs pas gnas gyur pa las /
analyzed: des 'gro ba rnams sngags kyi snod rud bar bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs pas gnas gyur pa las /
translated: one should transform the world into the maṇḍala of the celestial mansion through the rite of making migrating beings suitable vessels for mantra.

original: lha mo'i glus bskul bas sa bon la sogs pa'i rim pas rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom //
analyzed: lha mo'i glus bskul bas sa bon la sogs pa'i rim pas rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom //
translated: By the urging of the Goddess's song, one should meditate on Vairocana by the stages of the seed, etc.

original: zhes so // ji lta bu zhe na //
analyzed: zhes so // ji lta bu zhe na //
translated: How is that?

original: gsal zhing zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsal zhing zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is clear, etc.

original: me long 'dra ba las byung ba //
analyzed: me long 'dra ba las byung ba //
translated: Arisen from the mirror-like, etc.

original: zhes pa ni chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te de byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te de byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: The mirror-like intuition is the knowledge of all things as like reflections, and it is empowered.

original: rgyan rnams kun zhes pa ni gdu bu la sogs pas brgyan par bsams na sgrub pa po des byang chub thob ces so //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun zhes pa ni gdu bu la sogs pas brgyan par bsams na sgrub pa po des byang chub thob ces so //
translated: The all ornaments are the ornaments of bracelets, etc. If one imagines them, then that adept attains enlightenment.

original: de nas nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pas rgyas btab nas /
analyzed: de nas nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pas rgyas btab nas /
translated: Then, having sealed with the near-accomplishment, etc.,

original: bar gyi 'du byed la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs pas byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed de phyung nas /
analyzed: bar gyi 'du byed la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs pas byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed de phyung nas /
translated: one should generate the mandala of the enlightenment spirit by the rite of the intermediate activities, etc., and then emit it.

original: gnas su gnas pa la 'khor lo gzhan dang gnyis su med par bya ba dang nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pas rgyas btab pa las /
analyzed: gnas su gnas pa la 'khor lo gzhan dang gnyis su med par bya ba dang nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pas rgyas btab pa las /
translated: Having placed it in its place, one should make it non-dual with the other wheel, and then seal it with the near-accomplishment, etc.

original: bla na med pa'i mchod pas ma nyes par byas pas che ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid thig le la sogs pa bsgoms pas sems dbang du 'gyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i mchod pas ma nyes par byas pas che ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid thig le la sogs pa bsgoms pas sems dbang du 'gyur bar bya'o //
translated: By means of the unexcelled offering, one should bring the mind under control by means of the meditation on the reality of all great things, the drop, etc.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa yan lag gzhan yang byas nas dus rnam pa bzhir goms par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa yan lag gzhan yang byas nas dus rnam pa bzhir goms par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the yogi/nī who has completed the three meditative stabilizations should practice the other limbs and become familiar with them in the four periods of the day.

original: de nyid la /
analyzed: de nyid la /
translated: In that regard,

original: bsam gtan rdo rje rab bsgoms na //
analyzed: bsam gtan rdo rje rab bsgoms na //
translated: having meditated on the vajra of meditative stabilization,

original: zhes so // sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag ces pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po ste yul chad pa med pas na 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag ces pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po ste yul chad pa med pas na 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed pa'o //
translated: the “great self of the buddhas” is the great seal of Vairocana, and since the object is uninterrupted, one controls all worlds.

original: tshe 'di nyid kyis thob par 'gyur @73b zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad spangs pa /
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid kyis thob par 'gyur @73b zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad spangs pa /
translated: “One will attain in this very life” means that one abandons the eight worldly dharmas.

original: 'dod pa la ci rigs par spyod cing lus gnas par 'gyur ba tsam gyis cho ga shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas gong du gsungs pa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor gong du 'gro bas rang gi rigs kyi dbugs 'byin pas mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur🔽ro zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa la ci rigs par spyod cing lus gnas par 'gyur ba tsam gyis cho ga shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas gong du gsungs pa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor gong du 'gro bas rang gi rigs kyi dbugs 'byin pas mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
translated: The yogi who knows the rite, by merely engaging in the desired conduct and abiding in the body, through the yoga that was previously taught, through the exhalation of his own family, attains nirvana in this life.

original: phyi ma rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi ma rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should be applied in the same way to the subsequent [families].

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig ni bza' ba dang bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig ni bza' ba dang bsrung ba'o //
translated: The commitment of Vairochana is eating and protecting.

original: de sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyor ba ni 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyor ba ni 'byung ba'o //
translated: The yoga that precedes that is arising.

original: des 'dras bu mngon du byed pas na mdzes pa'i rdo rje'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des 'dras bu mngon du byed pas na mdzes pa'i rdo rje'o zhes bya'o //
translated: Since that causes the attainment of the result, it is called Beautiful Vajra.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni de'i rigs kyi 'khor lo'o //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'am /
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni de'i rigs kyi 'khor lo'o // rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'am /
translated: The vajra mandala is the wheel of that family.

original: nyi ma la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is the vajra that abides in the moon, or Akshobhya that abides in the sun.

original: de la mi bskyod pa ni zhe sdang gi rang bzhin bas na mche ba cung zad gtsigs pas na khro bo'o //
analyzed: de la mi bskyod pa ni zhe sdang gi rang bzhin bas na mche ba cung zad gtsigs pas na khro bo'o //
translated: Among them, Akṣhobhya is a wrathful one because he has a slightly bared fang, since he has the nature of hatred.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni zla ba lta bu'i kha dog mnga' bas na gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni zla ba lta bu'i kha dog mnga' bas na gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra zhes so //
translated: Since Vajrasattva has a color like the moon, he is like a clear body.

original: sbyor ba 'dis nyon mongs sel bas na zhi ba'i bsam gtan no /
analyzed: sbyor ba 'dis nyon mongs sel bas na zhi ba'i bsam gtan no /
translated: Since this yoga removes the afflictions, it is the meditation of peace.

original: rdo rje dam tshig dang / de las byung ba dang / zhal bzang ni gong ma ltar bshad do //
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig dang / de las byung ba dang / zhal bzang ni gong ma ltar bshad do //
translated: The vajra commitment, arisen from that, and good face are explained as above.

original: chos kyi sems dpa' zhes pa ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: chos kyi sems dpa' zhes pa ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: The dharma being is Amitābha.

original: gsal ba'i lus 'dzin zhes pa ni bandu ka ltar gsal ba ste /
analyzed: gsal ba'i lus 'dzin zhes pa ni bandu ka ltar gsal ba ste /
translated: The one who holds a clear body is clear like a bandhujīva flower,

original: zla ba lta bu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zla ba lta bu ni ma yin no //
translated: but not like the moon.

original: chos kyi bdag nyid che zhes pa ni bshad pa'i chos ni gsung gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: chos kyi bdag nyid che zhes pa ni bshad pa'i chos ni gsung gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The greatness of the nature of phenomena is the Dharma of explanation, which is the essence of speech.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho ni stobs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho ni stobs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The ocean of wisdom is the powers and so forth.

original: chos kyi sems dpa'i dam tshig dang 'byung ba dang spyan bzang rdo rje zhes pa yang gong ma ltar bshad do //
analyzed: chos kyi sems dpa'i dam tshig dang 'byung ba dang spyan bzang rdo rje zhes pa yang gong ma ltar bshad do //
translated: The commitment of the dharma being, arisen from that, and good face vajra are explained as above.

original: rin chen dbang phyug dang don yod grub pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rin chen dbang phyug dang don yod grub pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: Ratnasambhava and Amoghasiddhi should be understood in the same way.

original: spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi'i sbyor ba yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi'i sbyor ba yang gsungs pa /
translated: The union with Locanā, etc. is also stated:

original: zla ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The moon, etc.

original: thams cad kyis 'gran zla med pa'i zhal mnga' bas na zhal bzang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad kyis 'gran zla med pa'i zhal mnga' bas na zhal bzang ngo //
translated: Since all have an incomparable face, it is a good face.

original: byams pa'i spyan gyis 'gro ba thams cad nyi tshe bar gzigs pas na spyan ni rab tu yangs so //
analyzed: byams pa'i spyan gyis 'gro ba thams cad nyi tshe bar gzigs pas na spyan ni rab tu yangs so //
translated: Since all beings are seen with a loving eye, the eye is very wide.

original: sgyu ma'i mchog ldan pa zhes pa ni steg pa dang rol ba la sogs pa'i sgyu ma'i bstan bcos shes pa'o //🔽khams @74a * //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i mchog ldan pa zhes pa ni steg pa dang rol ba la sogs pa'i sgyu ma'i bstan bcos shes pa'o // khams @74a * //
translated: Possessing the supreme of illusions means knowing the treatise on illusion, such as pride and play, etc.

original: gsum la dbang ba'i ye shes ni gnyis su med pa ste de'i lam mo //
analyzed: gsum la dbang ba'i ye shes ni gnyis su med pa ste de'i lam mo //
translated: The knowledge of the three realms is nondual, and that is the path.

original: spyan zhes bya ba mi 'da' bas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: spyan zhes bya ba mi 'da' bas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
translated: Since the eye is called not transgressing, it is the pledge seal.

original: des phyag rgya chen po thob par byed pas na mchog dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: des phyag rgya chen po thob par byed pas na mchog dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Since it causes the attainment of the great seal, it is endowed with the supreme.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni thugs kyi rnam par dag pa'i m'a ma k'i'i dkyil 'khor te rigs kyi bdag pos rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni thugs kyi rnam par dag pa'i m'a ma k'i'i dkyil 'khor te rigs kyi bdag pos rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The vajra mandala is the mandala of Mamaki, the purity of mind, purified by the lord of the family.

original: rdo rje mchog gi dam tshig ces pa ni rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis 'da' bar byas pa ma yin pa m'a ma k'i zla ba'i gdan la bsgom mo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mchog gi dam tshig ces pa ni rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis 'da' bar byas pa ma yin pa m'a ma k'i zla ba'i gdan la bsgom mo zhes pa'o //
translated: The supreme pledge of the vajra is the meditation on the moon seat of Mamaki, not to be transgressed by the vajra clans.

original: 'gyur ba'i mchog ces pa ni de thob par byed pa'i lam zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ba'i mchog ces pa ni de thob par byed pa'i lam zhes pa'o //
translated: The supreme transformation is the path that causes one to attain that.

original: mthing ga zhes pa ni dmar po zhes bsgyur ro //
analyzed: mthing ga zhes pa ni dmar po zhes bsgyur ro //
translated: Blue is to be changed to red.

original: nam mkha'i 'od zer ni chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i 'od zer ni chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The light rays of space are the realm of phenomena.

original: de'i sprin ni m'a ma k'i ste snying rje'i rlan can no //
analyzed: de'i sprin ni m'a ma k'i ste snying rje'i rlan can no //
translated: The cloud of that is Mamaki, moist with compassion.

original: de nyid rdo rje ste mi bskyod pa tshim par byed pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje ste mi bskyod pa tshim par byed pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That itself is the vajra, called the satisfier of Akshobhya.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni gsung gi rnam par dag pa'i gos dkar mo'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni gsung gi rnam par dag pa'i gos dkar mo'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The dharma mandala is the wheel of Pandaravasini, the purity of speech.

original: 'dod chags chags pas sdug pa'i mchog / ces pa ni de'i spyod pa mkhas shing ldem bag can du kun gyi yid du 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags chags pas sdug pa'i mchog / ces pa ni de'i spyod pa mkhas shing ldem bag can du kun gyi yid du 'ong ba'o //
translated: Passionate with passion, the best of the beautiful, means that her conduct is skilled and graceful, pleasing to everyone.

original: dpral ba'i dbyes che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: dpral ba'i dbyes che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: She has all the characteristics complete, such as a broad forehead.

original: rdo rje chos ma zhes pa ni na bza' dkar mo zla ba'i gdan rab tu bsgom zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ma zhes pa ni na bza' dkar mo zla ba'i gdan rab tu bsgom zhes so //
translated: The Vajra Dharma Lady, means that one should visualize the white-clad lady on a moon seat.

original: chos kyi ye shes ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te de 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur pas na de skad do //
analyzed: chos kyi ye shes ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te de 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur pas na de skad do //
translated: The Dharma intuition is nondual intuition, and she is so called because she is the source of that.

original: autpala zhes pa ni rtags dbang gi tshig ste padma la bya'o //
analyzed: autpala zhes pa ni rtags dbang gi tshig ste padma la bya'o //
translated: The utpala is a sign of the word of power, and it means a lotus.

original: chos kyi dam tshig ni gos dkar mo'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dam tshig ni gos dkar mo'o //
translated: The Dharma commitment is the white-clad lady.

original: de kho na nyid mngon par byang chub ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'gyur ba med pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid mngon par byang chub ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'gyur ba med pa'o //
translated: The manifest enlightenment of reality is the unchanging innate intuition.

original: de kun du ston pa rdo rje zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de kun du ston pa rdo rje zhes bya'o //
translated: The universal display of that is called the Vajra.

original: dngos grub dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni don yod grub pas rnam par dag pa'i sgrol ma gtso bo gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni don yod grub pas rnam par dag pa'i sgrol ma gtso bo gyur pa'o //
translated: The “maṇḍala of powers” is the one in which Amoghasiddhi is the chief, with Tārā as the pure one.

original: sgrol ma mchog ces pa ni mi slu ba la sogs pas tha mal pa las grol ba ste zla ba'i gdan la bsgom par bya zhes so //
analyzed: sgrol ma mchog ces pa ni mi slu ba la sogs pas tha mal pa las grol ba ste zla ba'i gdan la bsgom par bya zhes so //
translated: “The supreme Tārā” is the one who is free from the ordinary, such as being undeceiving, and so on, and she should be visualized on a moon seat.

original: dam tshig sgrol mchog ni lha mo de'o //
analyzed: dam tshig sgrol mchog ni lha mo de'o //
translated: “The supreme Tārā of the commitments” is that goddess.

original: dbyer med pas na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: dbyer med pas na rdo rje'o //
translated: “The vajra” is indivisible.

original: rdo rje dga' ma ni kun gyi dpal du gyur pas rgyal mtshan no //
analyzed: rdo rje dga' ma ni kun gyi dpal du gyur pas rgyal mtshan no //
translated: “The vajra joy” is the banner, since it is the glory of all.

original: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo @74b mnyes par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la dgod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo @74b mnyes par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la dgod pa yin gyi /
translated: The goddesses beginning with Rūpavajrā are placed in the maṇḍala of the retinue that delights the enjoyment wheel.

original: spyan ma la sogs pa ltar 'khor lo'i bdag po ma yin no //
analyzed: spyan ma la sogs pa ltar 'khor lo'i bdag po ma yin no //
translated: They are not the lords of the wheel, like Locanā and so on.

original: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gsungs pa /
translated: The union of Yamāntaka and so on is taught.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa'o //
translated: “The maṇḍala of the sun” is the one in the heart.

original: phyag na ral gri ni mtshon pa tsam ste gzhan yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag na ral gri ni mtshon pa tsam ste gzhan yang shes par bya'o //
translated: “The sword in the hand” is merely an illustration, and one should know the others as well.

original: snad mdzad dbu rgyan la bsgoms na //
analyzed: snad mdzad dbu rgyan la bsgoms na //
translated: If one meditates on the crest-jewel,

original: zhes pa ni me long lta bur rnam par dag pa las byung ba'i phyir gshin rje gshed kyi longs spyod bzhi pa yin no //
