analyzed: zhes pa ni me long lta bur rnam par dag pa las byung ba'i phyir gshin rje gshed kyi longs spyod bzhi pa yin no //
translated: this is the fourth enjoyment of Yamântaka, because it arises from the mirror-like complete purity.

original: rdo rje can zhes pa ni gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: rdo rje can zhes pa ni gshin rje gshed do //
translated: The one with the vajra is Yamântaka.

original: de dam pa yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas su byed pas na dgyes par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de dam pa yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas su byed pas na dgyes par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: Since he makes the supreme perfect Buddha delighted, he is the delight.

original: de khro bo kun 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: de khro bo kun 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na dam tshig go //
translated: Since he is the commitment that cannot be transgressed by all the wrathful ones, he is the commitment.

original: gshin rje las ye shes kyi 'od 'phro ba snang ba nyid bas na bkod pa'o //
analyzed: gshin rje las ye shes kyi 'od 'phro ba snang ba nyid bas na bkod pa'o //
translated: Since he is the light of wisdom shining from Death, he is the array.

original: gzhan gyis mi thub ces pa ni brtson 'grus rnam pa bzhis de'i skyon kho na med par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub ces pa ni brtson 'grus rnam pa bzhis de'i skyon kho na med par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since he is the one who cannot be conquered by others, he is the unconquerable, because he removes just that fault by means of the four kinds of effort.

original: 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po can //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po can //
translated: He has many blazing light-rays.

original: zhes pa ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: This is the orb of the sun's light.

original: gzhan rnams me'i 'og tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams me'i 'og tu gnas pa'o //
translated: The others are located below the fire.

original: sbrul gyis brgyan cing ska rags byas //
analyzed: sbrul gyis brgyan cing ska rags byas //
translated: He is adorned with snakes and has a belt.

original: zhes pa ni gong ma ltar kun la shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gong ma ltar kun la shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood in the same way as above.

original: rdo rje bgrod pa 'jigs 'jigs lta //
analyzed: rdo rje bgrod pa 'jigs 'jigs lta //
translated: The Vajra-crossing is fearful and fearful-looking.

original: zhes pa yang kun la shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa yang kun la shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood in the same way as above.

original: gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni khro bo'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni khro bo'o //
translated: The unconquerable one is the wrathful one.

original: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pas na rdo rje bkod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pas na rdo rje bkod pa'o //
translated: That itself is the Vajra-array because of the arrangement of the Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje rta zhes bya ba bsgom zhes pa ni tshangs pa la sogs pa 'dul ba'i don du dbu la rta 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje rta zhes bya ba bsgom zhes pa ni tshangs pa la sogs pa 'dul ba'i don du dbu la rta 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The Vajra-horse is meditated upon, because the horse appears on the head for the sake of subduing Brahma and so forth.

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi don du dbu la rta 'byung ba srid pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi don du dbu la rta 'byung ba srid pa'o //
translated: It is possible that the horse appears on the head for the sake of beings.

original: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'dus pas na rnam par bkod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'dus pas na rnam par bkod pa'o //
translated: That itself is the array because of the assembly of many Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje mi 'chi zhes pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtog pa'i 'chi ba dang bral bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje mi 'chi zhes pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtog pa'i 'chi ba dang bral bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Vajra-immortal is Amrita-kundali, because he causes the abandonment of the death of discursive thought by means of meditative concentration.

original: mi 'chi ba ni de nyid do //
analyzed: mi 'chi ba ni de nyid do //
translated: The immortal is that itself.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi 'da' bas na dam tshig rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi 'da' bas na dam tshig rdo rje'o //
translated: The pledge-vajra is because the Tathagatas do not transgress it.

original: de rnams ni padma mthar byed ni 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan te de'i rigs las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams ni padma mthar byed ni 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan te de'i rigs las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Those are Padmanateśvara, who is crowned by Amitābha, because he is born from that family.

original: gzhan rnams ni mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the others are crowned by Akṣobhya.

original: da ni las kyi khyad bar gyi skabs su 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gsungs pa /🔽nyi ma'i dkyil @75a * //
analyzed: da ni las kyi khyad bar gyi skabs su 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gsungs pa / nyi ma'i dkyil @75a * //
translated: Now, in the context of the special activities, the application of Kāmarāja and so forth is stated.

original: 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa'o /
analyzed: 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa'o /
translated: The sun maṇḍala, and so forth.

original: rdo rje 'od gsal zhes pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i 'od de rnam par smin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'od gsal zhes pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i 'od de rnam par smin pa ma yin no //
translated: “Vajra luminosity” is the vajra-like luminosity, which is not fully ripened.

original: rang bzhin ni rtse gcig par byas pas na /
analyzed: rang bzhin ni rtse gcig par byas pas na /
translated: Since the nature is made one-pointed,

original: bsam gtan rdo rje ste 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rdo rje ste 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
translated: it is the vajra concentration, which is Kāmarāja.

original: de'i rdzogs par byang chub pa ni sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rdzogs par byang chub pa ni sbyor ba'o //
translated: His perfect awakening is the application.

original: stobs po che zhes pa ni gsang ba'i bdag po bas so //
analyzed: stobs po che zhes pa ni gsang ba'i bdag po bas so //
translated: “Mahābala” is the lord of guhyakas.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi gnas zhes pa ni de'i ngo bo dkyil 'khor gsum la gnas nas char 'bebs pas rgyan du byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi gnas zhes pa ni de'i ngo bo dkyil 'khor gsum la gnas nas char 'bebs pas rgyan du byed pa'o //
translated: The “place of the three vajras” is the place of the three maṇḍalas, which are his nature.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi stobs mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi stobs mnga' ba'o //
translated: He is the one who possesses the power of the three vajras.

original: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'dus pas na rdo rje bkod ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'dus pas na rdo rje bkod ba'o //
translated: He is the Vajra Array because he is the gathering of many Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje sngon po ni dbyug pa sngon po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sngon po ni dbyug pa sngon po'o //
translated: The blue vajra is the blue club.

original: khro bo rgya mtsho lta bu 'dug pa rnams bskyod pa'i rgyur gyur bas na rgya mtsho nag po skyod par byed ces so //
analyzed: khro bo rgya mtsho lta bu 'dug pa rnams bskyod pa'i rgyur gyur bas na rgya mtsho nag po skyod par byed ces so //
translated: He is the one who agitates the black ocean because he is the cause of agitating the wrathful ones who are like an ocean.

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa thogs pas na rdo rje dbyug pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa thogs pas na rdo rje dbyug pa'o //
translated: He is the Vajra Club because he holds a club marked with a vajra.

original: de nyid 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na dam tshig mchog ste gong ma ltar bkod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na dam tshig mchog ste gong ma ltar bkod pa'o //
translated: He is the supreme commitment because he is not to be transgressed, as above.

original: mi g-yo mchog ces pa ni mi g-yo mgon po'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo mchog ces pa ni mi g-yo mgon po'o //
translated: The supreme immovable one is the immovable protector.

original: khros shing 'jigs pa zhes pa ni g-yas pa'o /
analyzed: khros shing 'jigs pa zhes pa ni g-yas pa'o /
translated: The wrathful one is the right one.

original: zur gyis lta ba ni g-yon pa'o //
analyzed: zur gyis lta ba ni g-yon pa'o //
translated: The sidelong glance is the left one.

original: gtsigs pa ni g-yas kyi mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
analyzed: gtsigs pa ni g-yas kyi mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
translated: The bared fangs are the bared right fangs.

original: zhags pa ni dgug pa'i las la zhes so //
analyzed: zhags pa ni dgug pa'i las la zhes so //
translated: The noose is for the activity of summoning.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las byung ba'i phyir na rdo rje dbyings kyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las byung ba'i phyir na rdo rje dbyings kyi dam tshig go //
translated: He is the Vajra Realm Commitment because he arises from the wisdom of the realm of phenomena.

original: brtan zhing mi 'gyur bas na zhabs kyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: brtan zhing mi 'gyur bas na zhabs kyis gnon pa'o //
translated: He is firm and unmoving, and so he tramples on the earth.

original: de nyid gong ma ltar bkod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gong ma ltar bkod pa'o //
translated: He is arranged as above.

original: rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes pa ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o //🔽'khor lo 'bar bas yongs su bskor //
analyzed: rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes pa ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o // 'khor lo 'bar bas yongs su bskor //
translated: The wheel of knowledge is the wheel-turning uṣṇīṣa.🔽He is surrounded by blazing wheels.

original: zhes pa ni me'i 'od kyi nang du 'khor lo 'bar bas bskor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni me'i 'od kyi nang du 'khor lo 'bar bas bskor ba'o //
translated: He is surrounded by blazing wheels within the light of fire.

original: steng du gnas pas na gtsug tor 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: steng du gnas pas na gtsug tor 'khor lo'o //
translated: He is the uṣṇīṣa wheel because he abides above.

original: gtsug tor gyi dam tshig ni khro bo'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor gyi dam tshig ni khro bo'o //
translated: The uṣṇīṣa commitment is the wrathful one.

original: rim pa rnam par dag pas na rig pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: rim pa rnam par dag pas na rig pa'i stobs so //
translated: He is the power of knowledge because he is pure in stages.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pas na 'khor lo bkod pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pas na 'khor lo bkod pa'o //
translated: He is the wheel array because he is the assembly of the retinue of tathāgatas.

original: rdo rje gsum zhes pa ni gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum zhes pa ni gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
translated: The three vajras are the king of Sumbha.

original: me lce rnon po 'bar ba'i sku //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: me lce rnon po 'bar ba'i sku // zhes pa ni /
translated: His body blazes with sharp, flaming tongues of fire.

original: sku las 'od 'phro ba rnams rno zhing tsha ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sku las 'od 'phro ba rnams rno zhing tsha ba'i phyir ro //
translated: His body radiates light that is sharp and hot.

original: mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
translated: The nature of Akṣobhya is the vajra commitment.

original: de la gsum pa rab tu 'byung ba ste @75b skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de la gsum pa rab tu 'byung ba ste @75b skyes pa'o //
translated: There, the third is the one who appears, the one who is born.

original: de nyid gang ma ltar bkod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid gang ma ltar bkod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called the “array like a garland. ”

original: de'i sbyor ba gang yin pa ni ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba gang yin pa ni ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Its application is meditative stabilization.

original: de rnams ni mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan ba ste de'i rigs las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams ni mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan ba ste de'i rigs las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: They are crowned by Akṣhobhya, because they arise from his clan.

original: de ltar na bla ma chen po'i dad pa'i lha ste 'jam pa'i dbyangs so //
analyzed: de ltar na bla ma chen po'i dad pa'i lha ste 'jam pa'i dbyangs so //
translated: Thus, Mañjughosha is the deity of faith in the great teacher.

original: thabs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po ste /
analyzed: thabs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po ste /
translated: The lord of means is the Great Vajra Holder.

original: cho ga nyi shu dang ldan pa'i sgom khog bco lnga'o //
analyzed: cho ga nyi shu dang ldan pa'i sgom khog bco lnga'o //
translated: There are fifteen meditation sessions with twenty rites.

original: de nyid lha re re'i dbang du byas pas cho ga brgyad pa bco lnga'o //
analyzed: de nyid lha re re'i dbang du byas pas cho ga brgyad pa bco lnga'o //
translated: Each deity has fifteen rites, each with eight rites.

original: de la yang gcig ni cho ga bzhir yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la yang gcig ni cho ga bzhir yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One of those should be known as four rites.

original: de ltar 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i sgom khog bco lnga la cha mthun pa dang / lhag par mos pa ma gtogs pa'i cho gsum brgyar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i sgom khog bco lnga la cha mthun pa dang / lhag par mos pa ma gtogs pa'i cho gsum brgyar shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, there are three hundred rites in the fifteen meditation sessions with wheels, except for the concordant factors and the especially visualized.

original: de bzhin dran pa gcig pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i cho ga brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhir shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin dran pa gcig pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i cho ga brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhir shes par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, there are one hundred and twenty-four rites for the yoga of single recollection.

original: de ltar na cho ga bzhi brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhis sngon du bsnyen par bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar na cho ga bzhi brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhis sngon du bsnyen par bya ba bstan to //
translated: Thus, it is taught that one should perform the preliminary service with four hundred and twenty-four rites.

original: de rnams dang sgom khog bco brgyad la cho ga brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad la cho ga gsum gyis bsnan na cho ga lnga brgya lnga bcu rtsa lngas sgrub pa byed par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams dang sgom khog bco brgyad la cho ga brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad la cho ga gsum gyis bsnan na cho ga lnga brgya lnga bcu rtsa lngas sgrub pa byed par shes par bya'o //
translated: And if one adds the three rites to those eighteen meditation sessions and the two hundred and seventy-eight rites, one should know that one performs the service with five hundred and fifty-five rites.

original: da ni khro bo rnams kyi sgrub pa la sogs pa'i las kyis rdo rje ye shes kyang 'grub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni khro bo rnams kyi sgrub pa la sogs pa'i las kyis rdo rje ye shes kyang 'grub pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, it is said that one also accomplishes the vajra intuition by means of the rites of the wrathful ones' service, etc.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares this, beginning with the buddhas, etc.

original: sangs rgyas 'khor lo bkod pa yis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'khor lo bkod pa yis //
translated: The buddhas' array of wheels

original: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas gang yang rung pa'i rnal 'byor pas de'i 'khor lo bkod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas gang yang rung pa'i rnal 'byor pas de'i 'khor lo bkod pa'o //
translated: means the array of the wheels of any buddha whatsoever by a yogin of that [buddha].

original: des ting nge 'dzin dbyer mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes rnams mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhes so //
analyzed: des ting nge 'dzin dbyer mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes rnams mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhes so //
translated: By that means that one should perform the rites of service, etc. for the sake of realizing the vajra-like intuitions, whose nature is the indivisibility of the meditative concentrations.

original: 'gog pa ni bgegs rnams nye bar gcod pa'o ;
analyzed: 'gog pa ni bgegs rnams nye bar gcod pa'o ;
translated: Stopping means the destruction of the obstructors.

original: / gang gis she na gong du gsungs pa'i khro bo rdo rje yis zhes so //
analyzed: / gang gis she na gong du gsungs pa'i khro bo rdo rje yis zhes so //
translated: By whom? By the wrathful vajra, as stated above.

original: des ci 'grub ce na /
analyzed: des ci 'grub ce na /
translated: What is accomplished by that?

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: The vajra maṇḍala is accomplished.

original: dbyer mi phyed pa'i lha'i 'khor lo de 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dbyer mi phyed pa'i lha'i 'khor lo de 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: That indivisible circle of deities is accomplished.

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: The vajra is the tathāgatas.

original: de las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ni de'i rigs so //
analyzed: de las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ni de'i rigs so //
translated: Since one does not transgress that, the pledge is its family.

original: mang po 'dus pas na bkod pa'o //
analyzed: mang po 'dus pas na bkod pa'o //
translated: Since many are assembled, it is the array.

original: sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: The nature of the body, etc. , is reality.

original: de'i don bsgom pas bzlas brjod do //
analyzed: de'i don bsgom pas bzlas brjod do //
translated: The recitation is the meditation on that reality.

original: de nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu bas na mngon par byang chub pa'o //🔽de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi le'i @76a * //
analyzed: de nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu bas na mngon par byang chub pa'o // de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi le'i @76a * //
translated: Since that is the cause of manifest enlightenment, it is manifest enlightenment.

original: ste bcu gsum pa'o //
analyzed: ste bcu gsum pa'o //
translated: The chapter of the scripture that teaches that is the thirteenth.

original: le'u bcu gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bcu gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: The thirteenth chapter is finished.

original: // / le'u bcu bzhi pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / le'u bcu bzhi pa gsungs pa /
translated: Chapter Fourteen

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pas spyan mas shi ba sos bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pas spyan mas shi ba sos bar gsungs pa /
translated: Then, etc. , states that Caṇḍālī revives the dead.

original: zhi ba'i dam tshig ces pa zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa ni spyan te de nyid rnam par snang mdzad pas na mchog go //
analyzed: zhi ba'i dam tshig ces pa zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa ni spyan te de nyid rnam par snang mdzad pas na mchog go //
translated: The pledge of peace is the eye, which is the cause of peace, and since it is just that which is Vairochana, it is supreme.

original: de bas na rigs kyi bdag po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas na de'i rigs las byung ba'i sngags kyi bdag nyid can gyi lha mi 'byung ngo zhes gzhan rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de bas na rigs kyi bdag po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas na de'i rigs las byung ba'i sngags kyi bdag nyid can gyi lha mi 'byung ngo zhes gzhan rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: Therefore, since one abides in the samadhi of the lord of the family, the deity whose nature is mantra arises from that family. This should be applied to the others as well.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ni gong ma ltar sbyar te ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ni gong ma ltar sbyar te ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: All tathagatas, etc., is as above.

original: aom zhes pa la sogs pas ni lha dang dbyer med pa'i sngags bstan to //
analyzed: aom zhes pa la sogs pas ni lha dang dbyer med pa'i sngags bstan to //
translated: Om, etc., teaches the mantra that is inseparable from the deity.

original: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This, etc.

original: 'byor pa kun zhes pa ni thams cad shes rab kyi dgyes pa spros pa'o //
analyzed: 'byor pa kun zhes pa ni thams cad shes rab kyi dgyes pa spros pa'o //
translated: All wealth is the proliferation of the delight of wisdom.

original: de la dgyes pa ni rigs kyi lha'o //
analyzed: de la dgyes pa ni rigs kyi lha'o //
translated: Delight in that is the deity of the family.

original: de thugs mnyes shing dgyes par gyur nas sangs rgyas rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de thugs mnyes shing dgyes par gyur nas sangs rgyas rdo rje ste /
translated: When that delights the mind, it is the Buddha Vajra.

original: rnam par snang mdzad rjes su dran par 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad rjes su dran par 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: One will recollect Vairocana.

original: de'i las gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i las gsungs pa /
translated: His action is stated:

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: All buddhas, etc.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing 'byung ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing 'byung ba //
translated: The arising of the realm of all buddhas

original: zhes pa ni drag shul du bsgrubs pas rnam par bkod pa rnams ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas zhi bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni drag shul du bsgrubs pas rnam par bkod pa rnams ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas zhi bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: is the pacification by the previously explained rite of the fierce practice of the array.

original: las rnams thams cad rab sgrub cing //
analyzed: las rnams thams cad rab sgrub cing //
translated: And all actions are accomplished

original: zhes pa ni zhi ba ni gtso bo tsam ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni zhi ba ni gtso bo tsam ste /
translated: is just the principal pacification.

original: de nyid gdan dang mdog la sogs pa'i dbye bas ji skad bshad pa'i rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las rnams mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gdan dang mdog la sogs pa'i dbye bas ji skad bshad pa'i rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las rnams mdzad pa'o //
translated: By the division of the seat, color, etc. , he performs the previously explained action of increase, etc.

original: rdo rje dam tshig skul mdzad ma //
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig skul mdzad ma //
translated: The pledge of the vajra is the arousal.

original: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings spangs pa yin la shi bar mi byed do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings spangs pa yin la shi bar mi byed do //
translated: The pledge of the vajra is the arousal of the dharmadhatu, which is not killed.

original: byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin pas //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin pas //
translated: The great love is the nature.

original: rdo rje sku khyod ces pa la sogs pa'i glus bskul ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sku khyod ces pa la sogs pa'i glus bskul ba'o //
translated: The vajra body is you, etc. is the arousal by the song.

original: shi ba sos par byed pa gsungs //
analyzed: shi ba sos par byed pa gsungs //
translated: The reviving of the dead is stated.

original: zhes pa ni cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba byas la ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba byas la ;
translated: Having performed the rite just as it is,

original: ye shes lha mo'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du shi ba'i ro bzhag la /
analyzed: ye shes lha mo'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du shi ba'i ro bzhag la /
translated: place the corpse of the deceased on a moon at the heart of the goddess of exalted wisdom.

original: de'i sngags dang bsgrub bya'i ming spel ba de nyid gsum gyi bar du chud pa bzlas pas /🔽lam las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus shi ba de'i rnam par shes pa srid pa bar ma do 'am /
analyzed: de'i sngags dang bsgrub bya'i ming spel ba de nyid gsum gyi bar du chud pa bzlas pas / lam las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus shi ba de'i rnam par shes pa srid pa bar ma do 'am /
translated: Enclose the name of the deceased in the mantra and the three syllables.

original: yang skye gnas @76b su phyin pa dri ma med pa mi g-yo bar mar me ltar gnas pa bkug nas ro de'i snying gar bcug la /
analyzed: yang skye gnas @76b su phyin pa dri ma med pa mi g-yo bar mar me ltar gnas pa bkug nas ro de'i snying gar bcug la /
translated: The hook of light rays arising from the path summons the consciousness of the deceased, whether in the intermediate state or having gone to a birthplace, abiding like a lamp in a clean, unmoving place, and it enters the heart of the corpse.🔽Having placed the name of Locanā on that, the light rays of that goddess make the corpse invisible.

original: de la spyan ma'i ming bkod nas de'i 'od zer gyis ro de mi snang bar byas nas bsgrub bya de ming gi tha ma'i yi ge las bskyed pa spyan ma lta bur bsams te gang ba rnams rgyas par byas nas /
analyzed: de la spyan ma'i ming bkod nas de'i 'od zer gyis ro de mi snang bar byas nas bsgrub bya de ming gi tha ma'i yi ge las bskyed pa spyan ma lta bur bsams te gang ba rnams rgyas par byas nas /
translated: The deceased is imagined as Locanā, generated from the final letter of the name, and the limbs are expanded.

original: de'i lus la phreng ba'i sngags kyis phyi nang gtams par bsams pas /
analyzed: de'i lus la phreng ba'i sngags kyis phyi nang gtams par bsams pas /
translated: Having imagined that the body is filled inside and out with the garland mantra,

original: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis stobs dbab pa dang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa gong ma ltar byas pas /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis stobs dbab pa dang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa gong ma ltar byas pas /
translated: The light rays that arise from that, by the descent of power, conferral of initiation, and so forth, as above,

original: shi ba 'tsho ste bskal ba'i bar du yang gnas so //
analyzed: shi ba 'tsho ste bskal ba'i bar du yang gnas so //
translated: revive the dead, and they remain for an eon.

original: mtshan ma ngan pa'i slob ma la sogs pa bsrung pa'i phyir m'a ma k'i'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: mtshan ma ngan pa'i slob ma la sogs pa bsrung pa'i phyir m'a ma k'i'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: In order to protect the disciple of evil signs and so forth, the procedure of Māmakī is taught.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa gong ma ltar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa gong ma ltar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Then, etc., should be applied as above.

original: sku gsum gyi dam tshig ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sku gsum gyi dam tshig ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The commitment of the three bodies is the utterly pure realm of reality.

original: de nyid rdo rje khro bo ste mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje khro bo ste mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: That itself is the vajra wrathful one, Akṣobhya.

original: de bsgoms pa las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de bsgoms pa las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste /
translated: Since one does not transgress the meditation on that, it is the commitment.

original: de la snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi lha mo phyung ngo zhes pa la sogs pa gong ma ltar ro //
analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi lha mo phyung ngo zhes pa la sogs pa gong ma ltar ro //
translated: Having entered into union with that, the goddess of that family was emitted, etc., as above.

original: sku gsum dbyer med rdo rje can ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi lha rnams so //
analyzed: sku gsum dbyer med rdo rje can ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi lha rnams so //
translated: The vajra possessor of the indivisible three bodies is the deities of the vajra family.

original: rdo rje thugs ni mi bskyod pa ste de rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thugs ni mi bskyod pa ste de rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: Vajra mind is Akṣobhya, and that is the recollection.

original: las gsungs pa /
analyzed: las gsungs pa /
translated: The activity is taught.

original: rdo rje bsrung ba'i sbyor ba la//
analyzed: rdo rje bsrung ba'i sbyor ba la//
translated: The procedure of Vajravarada

original: zhes te spyan ma bzhin du bsrung bar bya ba snying gar gzhag pa dang stobs dbab pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes te spyan ma bzhin du bsrung bar bya ba snying gar gzhag pa dang stobs dbab pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: is to be known as before, in the heart, and the descent of strength, and so on, as in Locana.

original: gal te ro langs mas slob ma srung pa'i cho ga la rang gi lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas de'i spyi bor zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga 'greng bu h'um las bskyed ba bsgom mo //
analyzed: gal te ro langs mas slob ma srung pa'i cho ga la rang gi lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas de'i spyi bor zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga 'greng bu h'um las bskyed ba bsgom mo //
translated: If the zombie is to protect the disciple, one should visualize a five-pronged vajra standing on a moon at his crown, born from HŪṀ.

original: de'i lte bar m'a ma k'i bsgoms la de'i ye shes lha mo'i thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i zla ba la m'a bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i lte bar m'a ma k'i bsgoms la de'i ye shes lha mo'i thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i zla ba la m'a bsgoms te /
translated: One should visualize Māmakī in his navel, and at the heart of the intuition goddess there, on a moon standing on a sign, one should visualize MĀ.

original: de'i mtshan mar phreng ba'i sngags mgo yar 'greng ba bsams la bzlas pas /
analyzed: de'i mtshan mar phreng ba'i sngags mgo yar 'greng ba bsams la bzlas pas /
translated: One should visualize the mantra string of the rosary standing upright at its sign, and by repeating it

original: de las 'phros pa'i rdo rje phra mos lus thams cad la bskon bas nad gang gis kyang bzhi gtu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las 'phros pa'i rdo rje phra mos lus thams cad la bskon bas nad gang gis kyang bzhi gtu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the whole body is covered with vajra dust, and one becomes invulnerable to any disease.

original: de la sogs pa zhi ba la sogs pa yang bsgrubs pas na las rnams rab sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la sogs pa zhi ba la sogs pa yang bsgrubs pas na las rnams rab sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
translated: And so on means that one should also accomplish pacification and so forth. Therefore, it says accomplishing all activities.

original: rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Great vajra is Vajrasattva.

original: de'i 'jigs pas nyen pa ni drag shul du bsgrubs pas so //
analyzed: de'i 'jigs pas nyen pa ni drag shul du bsgrubs pas so //
translated: Terrified by him means that one should accomplish him wrathfully.

original: de'i skyabs te @77a * //
analyzed: de'i skyabs te @77a * //
translated: His protection means

original: rtags stobs su 'gyur ba ste sngags pa gang gis bsrung ba la shigs par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: rtags stobs su 'gyur ba ste sngags pa gang gis bsrung ba la shigs par dka' ba'o //
translated: the protection of the mantra practitioner.

original: de bas na gdon la sogs pa la yang cho ga 'di sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na gdon la sogs pa la yang cho ga 'di sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should apply this rite to the spirits and so forth.

original: na bza' dkar mos rgyas bar bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: na bza' dkar mos rgyas bar bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: The rite of increasing by Pāṇḍaravāsinī is stated:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, and so forth.

original: 'dod chags chen po'i dam tshig ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i dam tshig ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The pledge of great passion is the wisdom of discernment.

original: de'i snang ba ni 'od dpag med do //
analyzed: de'i snang ba ni 'od dpag med do //
translated: Its light is Amitābha.

original: gzhan ni gong ma ltar ro //
analyzed: gzhan ni gong ma ltar ro //
translated: The rest is as above.

original: chos mchog 'dzin pa ni de'i rigs kyi lha rnams so //
analyzed: chos mchog 'dzin pa ni de'i rigs kyi lha rnams so //
translated: The holders of the supreme Dharma are the deities of his family.

original: rdo rje chos ni snang ba mtha' yas te de rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ni snang ba mtha' yas te de rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: Vajradharma is Amitābha, and one should recollect him.

original: las gsungs pa /
analyzed: las gsungs pa /
translated: The rite is stated:🔽If one recites the mantra of Vajradharma, and so forth.

original: rtag tu chos zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu chos zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Always the Dharma, etc.

original: chos zhes pa ni stobs la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so //
analyzed: chos zhes pa ni stobs la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so //
translated: The Dharma is the Buddha’s qualities such as the powers.

original: rgyas mdzad pa ni nyams stobs zad pa rgyas par mdzad pa ste tshe'o //
analyzed: rgyas mdzad pa ni nyams stobs zad pa rgyas par mdzad pa ste tshe'o //
translated: The one who increases is the one who increases the exhaustion of the power of life.

original: mdzod po che dang ldan zhes pa ni mdzod rnams nor gyis dgang ba'o //
analyzed: mdzod po che dang ldan zhes pa ni mdzod rnams nor gyis dgang ba'o //
translated: The one who is endowed with the great treasure is the one who fills the treasures with wealth.

original: rdo rje'i gsung ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsung ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i gsung ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsung ste /
translated: The vajra speech is the speech of Great Vajradhara.

original: de bzhin du bzlas pa tsam gyis zhes pa ni ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas stobs rnyed par byed kyi gzhan ni ma gtogs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du bzlas pa tsam gyis zhes pa ni ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas stobs rnyed par byed kyi gzhan ni ma gtogs so //
translated: Likewise, by merely reciting, etc. means that one who has previously cultivated according to the stated ritual will attain power, but not otherwise.

original: byed par 'gyur zhes pa ni gdan la sogs pa kha dog ser por gos dkar mo'i thugs kar stobs la sogs pa ye shes lha mo'i snying gar rnam pa gsum 'dod pas gzhag ste /
analyzed: byed par 'gyur zhes pa ni gdan la sogs pa kha dog ser por gos dkar mo'i thugs kar stobs la sogs pa ye shes lha mo'i snying gar rnam pa gsum 'dod pas gzhag ste /
translated: One will accomplish, etc. means that one should place the three aspects in the heart of the wisdom goddess of power, etc. on the seat, etc. that is yellow in color, in the heart of Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: phreng ba'i sngags gdon par bya ba dang / 'od zer spro ba dang / gnas gsum du stobs dbab pa dang / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa le'u bcu gsum pa'i 'od dpag med kyi sbyor ba ltar byas pas bsgrub bya rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phreng ba'i sngags gdon par bya ba dang / 'od zer spro ba dang / gnas gsum du stobs dbab pa dang / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa le'u bcu gsum pa'i 'od dpag med kyi sbyor ba ltar byas pas bsgrub bya rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: One should recite the rosary mantra, emit light rays, bring down power into the three places, confer initiation, and so on, as in the Amoghasiddhi yoga of chapter 13.

original: sgrol mas dbang du bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: sgrol mas dbang du bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: The rite of bringing about liberation by means of Tārā is taught,

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with “Then, etc.”

original: kun du 'byung ba ni bya ba la nan tan gyi ye shes te de las byung ba'i don yod grub pa rdo rje zhes so //
analyzed: kun du 'byung ba ni bya ba la nan tan gyi ye shes te de las byung ba'i don yod grub pa rdo rje zhes so //
translated: The “universal source” is the gnosis of perseverance in action; the Amoghasiddhi-vajra has arisen from that.

original: gzhan gong ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan gong ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as above.

original: sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po ni las kyi rigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po ni las kyi rigs so //
translated: “The great being, Buddha” is the Action family.

original: rdo rje ni thugs kyi rigs te don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni thugs kyi rigs te don yod grub pa'o //
translated: “Vajra” is the Mind family, Amoghasiddhi.

original: de rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: de rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: One should recall that.

original: dbang dang dgug pa'i yul gsungs pa /
analyzed: dbang dang dgug pa'i yul gsungs pa /
translated: The object of subjugation and attraction is taught,

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with “Buddha, etc.”

original: sangs rgyas ni rigs su khas blangs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rigs su khas blangs pa'o //
translated: “Buddha” is one who has taken the vow of the family.

original: rdo rje ni @77b snying sra ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni @77b snying sra ba'o //
translated: “Vajra” is the hard heart.

original: sde chen ni sde chen pos bskul pa'i gzi can no //
analyzed: sde chen ni sde chen pos bskul pa'i gzi can no //
translated: The great assembly is the powerful one who is requested by the great assembly.

original: de las ma gtogs pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang bran bzhin du dbang du byed ces so //
analyzed: de las ma gtogs pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang bran bzhin du dbang du byed ces so //
translated: The realm of sentient beings, except for those, are brought under control like servants.

original: sbyor ba gang gis dbang du byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: sbyor ba gang gis dbang du byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that by which application one brings under control:

original: gdan la sogs pa kha dog dmar por sgrol ma'i sbyor ba byas la /
analyzed: gdan la sogs pa kha dog dmar por sgrol ma'i sbyor ba byas la /
translated: Having made a seat and so forth red in color, one should perform the yoga of Tārā.

original: de'i thugs kar ye shes lha mo'i snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i tam dmar po dang / de'i mtha' mar dmar po'i mdog mgo yar 'greng ba'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis bskor bar bsams nas /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar ye shes lha mo'i snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i tam dmar po dang / de'i mtha' mar dmar po'i mdog mgo yar 'greng ba'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis bskor bar bsams nas /
translated: At her heart, in the heart of the gnosis goddess, one should imagine a red tam on a moon, and around the edge of that, the mantra string of red color with the heads upward.🔽Having inserted the name of the one to be controlled between the three syllables of that, with the addition of svaha at the end, one should recite with ho.

original: de yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba sv'ah'a'i skabs su ho dang ldan pa bzlas pas de rnams kyi 'od zer dang / dmar ba'i mtshan ma rnams kyi 'od zer gyis bsgrub bya'i ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed la /
analyzed: de yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba sv'ah'a'i skabs su ho dang ldan pa bzlas pas de rnams kyi 'od zer dang / dmar ba'i mtshan ma rnams kyi 'od zer gyis bsgrub bya'i ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed la /
translated: The light rays of those and the light rays of the red signs generate the name syllables of the one to be controlled.

original: de'i skyes bu'i snying ga dang mgrin pa nas bskul /
analyzed: de'i skyes bu'i snying ga dang mgrin pa nas bskul /
translated: One should summon them from the heart and throat of that person.

original: bud med kyi padma nas bskul bas de'i sgo nas zhugs pas de'i sems zla ba dmar po lta bu blangs nas sgo de nas phyir log nas padma gnyis su zhugs nas bzlas brjod bya'o //
analyzed: bud med kyi padma nas bskul bas de'i sgo nas zhugs pas de'i sems zla ba dmar po lta bu blangs nas sgo de nas phyir log nas padma gnyis su zhugs nas bzlas brjod bya'o //
translated: Since she is aroused by the lotus of the woman, he enters her by that path. Having taken her mind, which is like red moon, he returns by that path and enters the two lotuses. He should recite the mantra.

original: bsgrub par bya ba yang snying rmongs pa'i ngo bo 'gyel nas rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du chud par bsam mo //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yang snying rmongs pa'i ngo bo 'gyel nas rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du chud par bsam mo //
translated: The one to be subdued, having fallen down, is imagined to be in the space between the two feet.

original: de ltar sdong po 'gyel nas rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og tu chud par bsam mo //
analyzed: de ltar sdong po 'gyel nas rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og tu chud par bsam mo //
translated: In that way, he is imagined to be like a fallen tree, in the space between the two feet.

original: de ltar na sdong po 'gyel ba bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro zhes so //🔽gal te mda' can gyi lhas las 'di byed na mda' des gong ma ltar 'bugs pa khyad par te gzhan gong ma ltar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na sdong po 'gyel ba bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro zhes so // gal te mda' can gyi lhas las 'di byed na mda' des gong ma ltar 'bugs pa khyad par te gzhan gong ma ltar shes par bya'o //
translated: In that way, he will be subdued, like a fallen tree.🔽If the god with the arrow performs this rite, the arrow will penetrate as above. The rest should be understood as above.

original: gal te le'u bcu gsum pa ltar byed na yang de ye shes lha mo'i thugs kar bzhag la phyi ma rnams gong ma ltar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te le'u bcu gsum pa ltar byed na yang de ye shes lha mo'i thugs kar bzhag la phyi ma rnams gong ma ltar shes par bya'o //
translated: If one performs this rite according to the thirteenth chapter, one should place the arrow in the heart of the goddess of wisdom. The rest should be understood as above.

original: 'di rnams kun gyi las rdzogs par bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di rnams kun gyi las rdzogs par bshad zin to //
translated: The actions of all of these have been explained.

original: gshin rje gshed kyis bu mo dgug pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed kyis bu mo dgug pa gsungs pa /
translated: Yama-kila speaks the summoning of the girl.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then and so forth.

original: dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: The cloud of stainless light rays is the mirror-like pristine awareness.

original: de nyid mi phyed bas na rdo rje ste rnam par snang mdzad lta bu'i tshul gyis snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi khro bo gshin rje gshed po'i sngags kyi bdag nyid 'di phyung ngo zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nyid mi phyed bas na rdo rje ste rnam par snang mdzad lta bu'i tshul gyis snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi khro bo gshin rje gshed po'i sngags kyi bdag nyid 'di phyung ngo zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Since that is indivisible, it is a vajra, and having entered into union in the manner of Vairochana, he emitted this mantra, which is the nature of the wrathful Yamantaka of that lineage.

original: sangs rgyas grags pa chen po ni sku'i rigs so //🔽khro bo'i cha lugs can gyi @78a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas grags pa chen po ni sku'i rigs so // khro bo'i cha lugs can gyi @78a * //
translated: Greatly renowned Buddha is the body lineage.

original: sngags phyung bas na 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur nas /
analyzed: sngags phyung bas na 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur nas /
translated: Having emitted the mantra of the one with the wrathful attire, he became frightened and terrified.

original: rdo rje sems zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: Remembering Vajrasattva is remembering Vairochana.

original: las gsungs pa /
analyzed: las gsungs pa /
translated: The action is stated:

original: thod pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thod pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Skull and so forth.

original: de la gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor bas bzlas par gsungs pa'i rim pas dpag du med pa'i bzlas brjod bya'o //
analyzed: de la gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor bas bzlas par gsungs pa'i rim pas dpag du med pa'i bzlas brjod bya'o //
translated: In this regard, one should perform an immeasurable recitation by the process taught for the recitation of the yogin of Yamântaka.

original: de nas lung thob nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod bya'o //
analyzed: de nas lung thob nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod bya'o //
translated: Then, having received the prophecy, one should recite one hundred thousand times.

original: de nas bud med kyi thod pa ma chag pa ma gos pa /
analyzed: de nas bud med kyi thod pa ma chag pa ma gos pa /
translated: Then, one should take an unbroken, unchipped skull of a woman,

original: gzugs padma ltar mdzes pa /
analyzed: gzugs padma ltar mdzes pa /
translated: beautiful like a lotus,

original: dum bu gcig pa yid du 'ong ba blangs la /
analyzed: dum bu gcig pa yid du 'ong ba blangs la /
translated: one piece, pleasing,

original: de'i dbus su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i padma 'dab brgyad pa bris te /🔽de'i lte bar dgug par bya ba'i bud med kyi gzugs brnyan gur gum mam /
analyzed: de'i dbus su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i padma 'dab brgyad pa bris te / de'i lte bar dgug par bya ba'i bud med kyi gzugs brnyan gur gum mam /
translated: and in the middle of that one should draw an eight-petaled lotus on an air maṇḍala.

original: go ro tsa nas bris la de'i snying gar phreng ba'i sngags kyi bu mo a'a karsha ya zhes pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang spel la dgug pa la sv'ah'a'i skabs su dza bris te mi 'gugs par byas nas snying gar glan no //
analyzed: go ro tsa nas bris la de'i snying gar phreng ba'i sngags kyi bu mo a'a karsha ya zhes pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang spel la dgug pa la sv'ah'a'i skabs su dza bris te mi 'gugs par byas nas snying gar glan no //
translated: In the center of that one should draw the reflection of the woman to be summoned with saffron or vermillion, and in her heart one should write the mantra string with the girl’s name, “Ākarṣaya,” and the name of the person to be summoned, adding “j” at the end of the svahā, and not writing the summoning “ākarṣaya.”

original: thod pa de yang rkang pa g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum pas mnan la phreng ba'i sngags rig pa dang bcas par lan gsum drag tu brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: thod pa de yang rkang pa g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum pas mnan la phreng ba'i sngags rig pa dang bcas par lan gsum drag tu brjod par bya'o //
translated: And he should press down on that skull with his right leg extended and left drawn in, and he should recite the mantra of the rosary together with the essence mantra three times with force.

original: sngags las byung ba'i lcags kyu thogs pa'i khro bos rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya 'dren par bsams na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngags las byung ba'i lcags kyu thogs pa'i khro bos rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya 'dren par bsams na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If he imagines that the wrathful one holding an iron hook produced from the mantra draws the victim who is situated on the wind mandala, he will succeed.

original: 'ongs pa'i tshe yang 'tshe ba bzlog pa'i phyir spyan gyis zhi bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'ongs pa'i tshe yang 'tshe ba bzlog pa'i phyir spyan gyis zhi bar bya'o //
translated: And when the victim arrives, he should pacify him with his gaze in order to ward off his violence.

original: de bzhin du m'a ma k'i skyang bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du m'a ma k'i skyang bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: And likewise he should protect him with Māmakī.

original: de bzhin du skyes pa'i thod pa la g-yon brkyang nas g-yas bskum pas mnan pa khyad par te gzhan gong ma ltar byas na skyes pa yang 'gugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du skyes pa'i thod pa la g-yon brkyang nas g-yas bskum pas mnan pa khyad par te gzhan gong ma ltar byas na skyes pa yang 'gugs so //
translated: And likewise, if he does the same with a man’s skull, with his left leg extended and right drawn in, he will summon a man.

original: mi bskyod pa zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
translated: Akṣobhya means Vajradhara.

original: 'od zer stug po mchog ces pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: 'od zer stug po mchog ces pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: Dense light rays means the gnosis of the extremely pure sphere of reality.

original: mi bskyod pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi khro bo phyung ngo zhes so //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi khro bo phyung ngo zhes so //
translated: Having entered into union in the manner of Akṣobhya, he emanated the wrathful one of that family.

original: sangs rgyas grags pa chen po ni thugs kyi rigs rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas grags pa chen po ni thugs kyi rigs rnams so //
translated: The great fame of the Buddha is the families of mind.

original: sems can rol mo bstan pa'i phyir brgyal zhing 'jigs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sems can rol mo bstan pa'i phyir brgyal zhing 'jigs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: In order to show the play of sentient beings, he fainted and was frightened.

original: mi bskyod pa rjes su dran na @78b 'jigs pa dang bral bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa rjes su dran na @78b 'jigs pa dang bral bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show that one who recollects Akṣobhya is free from fear,

original: rdo rje sku ni rjes su dran //
analyzed: rdo rje sku ni rjes su dran //
translated: he said, “I recollect the vajra body.

original: zhes so // gzhan rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // gzhan rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: ” The others should be applied in the same way.

original: las gsungs pa /
analyzed: las gsungs pa /
translated: The activity is stated:

original: sngags rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The mantras” and so forth.

original: sngags rnams ni lha thams cad do //
analyzed: sngags rnams ni lha thams cad do //
translated: The mantras are all the deities.

original: de'i las thams cad la 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sbyor ba ste bya ba thams cad byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i las thams cad la 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sbyor ba ste bya ba thams cad byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: In all their activities, one should employ Ārya Amṛtakuṇḍali, because he performs all activities.

original: ji skad du rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsum rnams dang / 'khyil pa las ni thams cad byed //
analyzed: ji skad du rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsum rnams dang / 'khyil pa las ni thams cad byed //
translated: As it is said, “In the three maṇḍalas of the five families, all activities are performed by Kuṇḍali.

original: ces pa 'jig rten sgrol ma las bshad do //
analyzed: ces pa 'jig rten sgrol ma las bshad do //
translated: This is explained in the Tārā of the World.

original: khyad par gyi las gsungs pa /
analyzed: khyad par gyi las gsungs pa /
translated: The special activities are stated:

original: rdo rje bskrad ba'i las rnams la //
analyzed: rdo rje bskrad ba'i las rnams la //
translated: In the activities of expelling with the vajra,

original: zhes te gnas nas spong ba'i las so //
analyzed: zhes te gnas nas spong ba'i las so //
translated: the activity of banishing from a place.

original: des / sangs rgyas dag gi dpung yang skrod //
analyzed: des / sangs rgyas dag gi dpung yang skrod //
translated: By that, even the army of the buddhas is expelled.

original: ces so // ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ces so // ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: tshul bzhin byas na zhes 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
analyzed: tshul bzhin byas na zhes 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
translated: If one acts properly,

original: ro bsregs pa'i smyo byed kyi shing gi sol ba dang / khi ti kha dang / mu zi dang / aa ri sha'i lo ma dang / dug dang rkang pa g-yon pa'i ming med kyi khrag rnams gcig tu btags la /
analyzed: ro bsregs pa'i smyo byed kyi shing gi sol ba dang / khi ti kha dang / mu zi dang / aa ri sha'i lo ma dang / dug dang rkang pa g-yon pa'i ming med kyi khrag rnams gcig tu btags la /
translated: one should combine the practice of Ārya Amṛtakuṇḍali, and mix together the charcoal of the cremation wood, kīṭha, bitumen, leaves of the arișa plant, poison, and the blood of the left toe of one who has died.

original: kha ta'i gshog pa'i smyu gus rgyal mtshan gyi ras la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i ral gri rtse brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bris pa ;
analyzed: kha ta'i gshog pa'i smyu gus rgyal mtshan gyi ras la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i ral gri rtse brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bris pa ;
translated: With a pen made of the wing of a kākā, draw on a banner cloth a wheel with an eight-spoked sword on a wind maṇḍala.

original: de'i lte bar bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bris nas de'i snying gar phreng ba'i sngags kyis mi 'gugs par che ge mo au tsa ta ya zhes pa bris la bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan par brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par sngags la ras ma de tshangs ma la sogs
analyzed: de'i lte bar bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bris nas de'i snying gar phreng ba'i sngags kyis mi 'gugs par che ge mo au tsa ta ya zhes pa bris la bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan par brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par sngags la ras ma de tshangs ma la sogs
translated: Having drawn an image of the victim in the center of that, write with the mantra of the rosary, “Summon so-and-so, Ucchuṣma,” in his heart.🔽Having enchanted that cloth with the words of entreaty one hundred and eight times, offer it to Brahmā, etc.

original: pa'i gnas su sa brkos pa la sba bar bya'o //
analyzed: pa'i gnas su sa brkos pa la sba bar bya'o //
translated: Having drawn an image of the victim in the center of that, one writes in his heart with the mantra of the rosary, “So-and-so, be summoned!” without the summoning, and having enchanted that cloth with the mantra one hundred and eight times together with the words of entreaty, one buries it in a hole dug in the ground in the abode of a virgin, and so on.

original: de ltar skrod par 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: de ltar skrod par 'gyur zhes so //
translated: Thus, he will be expelled.

original: 'dir yang sngon du bsnyen pa la ni phreng ba'i sngags ji bzhin du bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang sngon du bsnyen pa la ni phreng ba'i sngags ji bzhin du bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Here, too, in the preliminary service one should repeat the mantra of the rosary as it is.

original: las la sbyor ba'i skabs su ma h'a gana pa ti dza'i ba ti aanta ka ra zhes pa bsal nas che ge mo au tsa ta ya phat ces gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: las la sbyor ba'i skabs su ma h'a gana pa ti dza'i ba ti aanta ka ra zhes pa bsal nas che ge mo au tsa ta ya phat ces gzhug par bya'o //
translated: In the context of application to the rite, having removed “Mahāgaṇapati Jīvaṃti Aṃtaka,” one should insert “So-and-so, be summoned! Phaṭ!”

original: kyang zhes pa ni ming dang spel zhing thog ma dang tha mar bskul ba 'di bya'o zhes pa dang / yang na sngags tshig re re zhing ming dang spel bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: kyang zhes pa ni ming dang spel zhing thog ma dang tha mar bskul ba 'di bya'o zhes pa dang / yang na sngags tshig re re zhing ming dang spel bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: The word also means that one should add the name and the beginning and end, and one should also add the name to each mantra word.

original: shes rab mthar byed kyi gnyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: shes rab mthar byed kyi gnyis gsungs pa /
translated: The two of Prajñānta are stated:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽sangs @79a * //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o // sangs @79a * //
translated: Then, etc.

original: rgyas kyi 'od zer zhes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: rgyas kyi 'od zer zhes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: The light of the buddhas is the gnosis of the extremely pure realm of reality.

original: de nyid rdo rje ste mi bskyod pa'i tshul du snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi khro bo byung ngo zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje ste mi bskyod pa'i tshul du snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi khro bo byung ngo zhes so //
translated: That itself is the vajra, and having entered into union in the manner of Akṣobhya, the wrathful one of that family arose.

original: byang chub sems ni bskyod pas te rjes su dran pas 'jigs pa dang bral zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni bskyod pas te rjes su dran pas 'jigs pa dang bral zhes sbyar ro //
translated: The awakened mind is the recollection, and one should supply free from fear.

original: las gsungs pa /
analyzed: las gsungs pa /
translated: The activity is stated:

original: srin po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: srin po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The rākṣasas, etc.

original: srin po ni srin po'o //
analyzed: srin po ni srin po'o //
translated: The rākṣasas are the rākṣasas.

original: ma rungs pa ni sprul lo //
analyzed: ma rungs pa ni sprul lo //
translated: The wicked are the nāgas.

original: gtum po ni seng ge la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gtum po ni seng ge la sogs pa'o //
translated: The fierce are the lions, etc.

original: de la sogs pa 'jigs pa chen pos 'khrugs pa la zhes so //
analyzed: de la sogs pa 'jigs pa chen pos 'khrugs pa la zhes so //
translated: And so on, disturbed by great fear.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rab sbyar nas //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rab sbyar nas //
translated: Having applied Vajrasattva,

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' sngon du 'gro ba'i shes rab mthar byed kyis sbyar na las rnams cho ga bzhin du byed ces so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' sngon du 'gro ba'i shes rab mthar byed kyis sbyar na las rnams cho ga bzhin du byed ces so //
translated: the rites are performed according to procedure means that when one applies the rite of Prajñānta with Vajrasattva as the preliminary, the rites are performed according to procedure.

original: cho ga ni 'di lta ste shes rab mthar byed kyi rnal 'byor pas srin po la sogs pas zin pa'i bsgrub bya'i lus la srin po la sogs pa yid kyis bsdus la /
analyzed: cho ga ni 'di lta ste shes rab mthar byed kyi rnal 'byor pas srin po la sogs pas zin pa'i bsgrub bya'i lus la srin po la sogs pa yid kyis bsdus la /
translated: The procedure is as follows: The yogin of Prajñānta mentally gathers the rākṣasas and so on into the body of the victim seized by the rākṣasas and so on.

original: rkang pa gnyis thabs dang shes rab tu gyur pas btsir la mnye bar bya zhing /
analyzed: rkang pa gnyis thabs dang shes rab tu gyur pas btsir la mnye bar bya zhing /
translated: Having pressed the two feet, which are method and wisdom, he should massage.

original: che ge mo r'aksha sa 'di phyi mo tsa ya zhes bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan par phreng ba'i sngags gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: che ge mo r'aksha sa 'di phyi mo tsa ya zhes bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan par phreng ba'i sngags gdon par bya'o //
translated: He should recite the mantra of the rosary, endowed with the words of the invocation, So-and-so rakṣa, release such-and-such!

original: de bzhin du lag pa 'bar ba'i rdo rjes 'byung ba dang / brdung ba dang bal po se'u'i lhug mas brdab pa la sogs pa byas pas grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du lag pa 'bar ba'i rdo rjes 'byung ba dang / brdung ba dang bal po se'u'i lhug mas brdab pa la sogs pa byas pas grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, by the blazing vajra in the hand, the arising, beating, and striking with the soft palm and so on, he will be liberated.

original: sbyor ba de kho nas bsgrub bya sprul la sogs pas bzung ba yang grol bar byed do //🔽yang des 'dzin par 'dod na de'i sbyor bas nag po gnyis la dur khrod kyi so phag gam /
analyzed: sbyor ba de kho nas bsgrub bya sprul la sogs pas bzung ba yang grol bar byed do // yang des 'dzin par 'dod na de'i sbyor bas nag po gnyis la dur khrod kyi so phag gam /
translated: By that very application, the object to be liberated is also liberated by the emanation and so forth.🔽If one wishes to hold it, then by that application, on two black [slabs], one should draw a skull of one killed by a blow from a brick or a weapon in a charnel ground.

original: mtshon gyis phog pas shi ba'i thod pa la h'um las byung pa'i 'jigs su rung ba skra brdzes pa /
analyzed: mtshon gyis phog pas shi ba'i thod pa la h'um las byung pa'i 'jigs su rung ba skra brdzes pa /
translated: From a hūṃ, one should draw a terrifying [being] with disheveled hair,🔽fanged teeth, a corpse in the right hand, and a threatening gesture in the left hand.

original: mche ba gtsigs pa g-yas na ro langs kyi ga ta ri dang / g-yon sdigs 'dzub  byed pa'i srin po bris te de'i snying gar dug dang rus phye dang / mthe'u chung khrag gis che ge mo grihna h'um phat ces sngags bri'o //
analyzed: mche ba gtsigs pa g-yas na ro langs kyi ga ta ri dang / g-yon sdigs 'dzub  byed pa'i srin po bris te de'i snying gar dug dang rus phye dang / mthe'u chung khrag gis che ge mo grihna h'um phat ces sngags bri'o //
translated: In its heart one should write the mantra “Take so-and-so, gṛhṇa hūṃ phaṭ,” with poison, bone ash, and the blood of the ring finger.

original: thod pa gnyis par bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes dang / ro bsregs pa'i sa dang / thal ba dang / sol ba dang / gcin gyis sprus pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
analyzed: thod pa gnyis par bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes dang / ro bsregs pa'i sa dang / thal ba dang / sol ba dang / gcin gyis sprus pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
translated: On the second skull, one should make an effigy of the victim with earth from a charnel ground, ash, charcoal, and urine.

original: de'i snying gar dug dang rus phye dang mdzub mo'i khrag dang ming dang sngags su bcas pa ta la'i lo ma la bris pa bcug nas gnyis ka @79b bkug ste bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan 'og tu gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i snying gar dug dang rus phye dang mdzub mo'i khrag dang ming dang sngags su bcas pa ta la'i lo ma la bris pa bcug nas gnyis ka @79b bkug ste bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan 'og tu gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Having placed poison, bone-ash, and the blood of the ring finger, together with the name and mantra, on a palm leaf, one should summon both and place the effigy beneath.

original: de mnan cing bzung bar bsams nas bsgyings nas dur khrod du sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de mnan cing bzung bar bsams nas bsgyings nas dur khrod du sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Having imagined that it is suppressed and held, one should recite the mantra in a cemetery, with pride.

original: des na de gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then it will be held.

original: sbyor ba des sprul la sogs pas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba des sprul la sogs pas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this method, one can also hold snakes and so forth.

original: padma mthar byed kyis dug 'byung ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: padma mthar byed kyis dug 'byung ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: Padmanateśvara teaches the rite of poison-emergence.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: rdo rje dpag tu med pa ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje dpag tu med pa ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Vajra-Amitābha is the discriminative-awareness-wisdom.

original: de'i 'byung ba ni snang ba mtha' yas te de'i tshul gyis snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi khro bo phyung ngo zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i 'byung ba ni snang ba mtha' yas te de'i tshul gyis snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi khro bo phyung ngo zhes sbyar ro //
translated: His emergence is Amitābha, and having entered into union with him in that way, the wrathful one of his clan is sent forth—this is the connection.

original: chos kyi rdo rje mchog skyes ni gsung gi rigs kyi lha rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi rdo rje mchog skyes ni gsung gi rigs kyi lha rnams so //
translated: The supreme-born Dharma-vajra is the deities of the speech family.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
translated: The ocean of intuition is Amitābha.

original: de rjes su dran pas 'jigs pa dang bral zhes sbyor ro //
analyzed: de rjes su dran pas 'jigs pa dang bral zhes sbyor ro //
translated: By recollecting him, one is free from fear.

original: las gsungs pa /
analyzed: las gsungs pa /
translated: The activity is stated:

original: mkha' dbyings zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' dbyings zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the sky-realm, etc.

original: de la mkha' dbyings dug gis gang ba yang sel nus na bsgrub bya re re'i dug lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes so //
analyzed: de la mkha' dbyings dug gis gang ba yang sel nus na bsgrub bya re re'i dug lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes so //
translated: If one is able to remove even a sky-realm filled with poison, what need is there to mention the poison of each of the beings to be accomplished?

original: rdo rje mi bzad pa ni phal bas shigs par dka' ba ste ha la ha la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mi bzad pa ni phal bas shigs par dka' ba ste ha la ha la'o //
translated: The invincible vajra is difficult to break by ordinary means, and is the [vajra] hālāhala.

original: de khro bo rgyal pos bskul bya yis //
analyzed: de khro bo rgyal pos bskul bya yis //
translated: That is to be invoked by the wrathful king.

original: zhes te sku mdog dkar po rta mgrin gyi sbyor ba byas la snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la h'um dkar po dgod do //
analyzed: zhes te sku mdog dkar po rta mgrin gyi sbyor ba byas la snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la h'um dkar po dgod do //
translated: That is, having performed the yoga of white Hayagrīva, one should place a white hūṃ on a moon disk at the heart.

original: de'i 'od zer gyis yan lag thams cad la gnas pa'i dug rab tu bsdus nas /
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyis yan lag thams cad la gnas pa'i dug rab tu bsdus nas /
translated: Light rays from that gather in all the poisons located in the limbs.

original: lag pa g-yas par h'um las byung ba'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dkar po'i lte bar h'um bsams pa'i 'od zer dkar po las bdud rtsi 'bar 'bab par bsams la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas par h'um las byung ba'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dkar po'i lte bar h'um bsams pa'i 'od zer dkar po las bdud rtsi 'bar 'bab par bsams la /
translated: On one's right hand, from HŪṀ, is a white eight-petaled lotus, in the center of which is a HŪṀ. One should imagine that white nectar descends from the light rays of the HŪṀ.

original: des ming gi dang pos bskyed pa'i bsgrub bya'i lus la dug nag pos khyab pa gzhan du blangs la bdud rtsi dkar pos de'i shul du dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: des ming gi dang pos bskyed pa'i bsgrub bya'i lus la dug nag pos khyab pa gzhan du blangs la bdud rtsi dkar pos de'i shul du dbab par bya'o //
translated: With that, one should imagine that the body of the victim generated by the first syllable is pervaded by black poison, and that the white nectar descends in its place.

original: ming dang bcas pa'i phreng ba'i sngags bzlas pas dug rnams thams cad med par byed ces so //
analyzed: ming dang bcas pa'i phreng ba'i sngags bzlas pas dug rnams thams cad med par byed ces so //
translated: By reciting the mantra with the name, all poisons are removed.

original: dbyug pa sngon pos dgra bsad pa'i cho ga gsungs pa ;
analyzed: dbyug pa sngon pos dgra bsad pa'i cho ga gsungs pa ;
translated: The rite of killing an enemy with the blue club is taught.

original: de nas zhes pa la sgos pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sgos pa'o //
translated: Then is the special case.

original: mi bskyod pa zhes pa ni gong ma ltar rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa zhes pa ni gong ma ltar rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
translated: Akshobhya is Vajradhara as before.

original: rdo rje'i dpal dbyung ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dpal dbyung ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: The glory of the vajra is the wisdom of the realm of phenomena.

original: de la mi bskyod pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi khro bo phyung ngo zhes 'og nas 'byung ba'i @80a * //
analyzed: de la mi bskyod pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rigs kyi khro bo phyung ngo zhes 'og nas 'byung ba'i @80a * //
translated: Having entered into union with her in an unshaken manner, he emitted the wrathful one of her clan.

original: khro bo bzhi la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo bzhi la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should be applied to the four wrathful ones that will come below.

original: gdug pa'i mchog ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa'i mchog ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The supreme of the fierce ones is Akshobhya.

original: de las byung ba ni de'i rigs so //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni de'i rigs so //
translated: That which arises from him is of his clan.

original: rol mo bstan pa'i phyir 'jigs shing skrag pa'o //
analyzed: rol mo bstan pa'i phyir 'jigs shing skrag pa'o //
translated: In order to show the music, there is fear and terror.

original: mi bskyod pa dran pas 'jigs pa dang brla bas na rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa dran pas 'jigs pa dang brla bas na rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran //
translated: Since one is fearful and terrified by remembering Akshobhya, one recollects Vajrasattva.

original: zhes te 'og nas 'byung ba'i khro bo bzhi la yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes te 'og nas 'byung ba'i khro bo bzhi la yang sbyar ro //
translated: This should be applied to the four wrathful ones that will come below.

original: las gsungs pa /
analyzed: las gsungs pa /
translated: The activity is stated:

original: khro bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The wrathful king, etc.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po grags chen ni 'phags pa dbyug pa sngon po'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po grags chen ni 'phags pa dbyug pa sngon po'o //
translated: The great famous wrathful king is Noble Nīladaṇḍa.

original: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzla ba ni las la sbyor ba'i skabs su'o //
analyzed: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzla ba ni las la sbyor ba'i skabs su'o //
translated: Reciting one hundred and eight times is in the context of applying the activity.

original: cho ga tshul bzhin zhes pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: cho ga tshul bzhin zhes pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The proper rite is as follows.

original: dbyug pa sngon po'i rnal 'byor pas sha chen dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / grog mkhar gyi sa dang / phub ma dang / bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi sa rnams bong bu'i gcin gyis sprul la bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
analyzed: dbyug pa sngon po'i rnal 'byor pas sha chen dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / grog mkhar gyi sa dang / phub ma dang / bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi sa rnams bong bu'i gcin gyis sprul la bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
translated: The yogin of blue club should mix human flesh, charnel ground ash, anthill earth, chaff, and earth from the footprint of the victim with donkey urine, and make an effigy of the victim.

original: dur khrod kyi gnas la dug dang khrag dang rams kyis sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming phreng ba'i sngags mi 'gugs par spel la /
analyzed: dur khrod kyi gnas la dug dang khrag dang rams kyis sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming phreng ba'i sngags mi 'gugs par spel la /
translated: In a charnel ground, with poison, blood, and lac, he should draw a variegated vajra in the center of a fire mandala, and in the center of that he should write the victim's name with the mantra garland, without the invocation,

original: sv'a h'a bton te h'um phat dang ldan par bris la snying gar gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: sv'a h'a bton te h'um phat dang ldan par bris la snying gar gzhug par bya'o //
translated: and with svāhā, hūṃ, and phaṭ. He should place it in the heart of the effigy.

original: de bkug ste bcug nas thod pa kha sbyar du bzhag la /
analyzed: de bkug ste bcug nas thod pa kha sbyar du bzhag la /
translated: Having summoned the victim and placed him there, he should place the skull cups together.

original: shin tu khros pas rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te nyi ma'i gung dang nam phyed na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing rdo dang rus pa dang / nim pa'i lo ma rnams kyis mnan cing zhag bdun du byas nas gdug pa thams cad gsod par byed ces so //
analyzed: shin tu khros pas rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te nyi ma'i gung dang nam phyed na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing rdo dang rus pa dang / nim pa'i lo ma rnams kyis mnan cing zhag bdun du byas nas gdug pa thams cad gsod par byed ces so //
translated: Pressing down with the left foot, one should recite at midday or midnight one hundred and eight times, pressing down with stones, bones, and neem leaves, and doing this for seven days, one will kill all evildoers.

original: gal te des ma grub na dur khrod du sod la nam phyed kyi dus su ro bsregs pa'i thal ba la me thab gru gsum byas la /
analyzed: gal te des ma grub na dur khrod du sod la nam phyed kyi dus su ro bsregs pa'i thal ba la me thab gru gsum byas la /
translated: If one does not succeed by that, then having gone to a charnel ground, at midnight one should make a triangular hearth with the ashes of a burned corpse.

original: shing nim pa'i me sbar la /
analyzed: shing nim pa'i me sbar la /
translated: Having lit a fire with neem sticks,

original: shin tu zhal rnam par 'gyur ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po gdangs pa bsams nas /
analyzed: shin tu zhal rnam par 'gyur ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po gdangs pa bsams nas /
translated: one should imagine the King of Wrathful Ones, his face greatly distorted, gaping.

original: gzugs brnyan rkang pa g-yon pa nas mtshon rnon pos gtub cing che ge mo m'a ra ya phat ces pa dang ldan par phreng ba'i sngags bzlas shing sbyin sreg byas na de'i mtshan mo kho na 'chi bar nges so //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan rkang pa g-yon pa nas mtshon rnon pos gtub cing che ge mo m'a ra ya phat ces pa dang ldan par phreng ba'i sngags bzlas shing sbyin sreg byas na de'i mtshan mo kho na 'chi bar nges so //
translated: Reciting the mantra of the rosary, “Kill such-and-such, phaṭ,” one should cut up the effigy with a sharp weapon from the left foot, and if one performs the burnt offering, he will certainly die that very night.

original: stobs po ches char dbab pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: stobs po ches char dbab pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: The rite of Mahābala for causing rain

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then and so forth.

original: stobs po che'i klu rnams kun //
analyzed: stobs po che'i klu rnams kun //
translated: All the great nāgas

original: zhes pa ni des 'dul ba'i klu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni des 'dul ba'i klu'o //
translated: are those nāgas who are subdued by him.

original: sngags @80b kyi mthus 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams dmag bzhin du rjes su dran pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir sku gsum rdo rje rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: sngags @80b kyi mthus 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams dmag bzhin du rjes su dran pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir sku gsum rdo rje rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: By the power of the mantra, those who are frightened and terrified are free from the fear of being pursued like an army, so it is the recollection of the three vajra bodies.

original: de'i las gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i las gsungs pa /
translated: His action is stated:

original: bzlas pa tsam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bzlas pa tsam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: By mere recitation and so forth.

original: bzlas pa tsam gyis sbyor ba zhes pa ni bzlas par gsungs pa'i grangs med pa'i bzlas pa byas pas lha'i lung thob nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas zhi ba la sogs pa'i lha thams cad kyi las sgrub par byed pas na las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed
analyzed: bzlas pa tsam gyis sbyor ba zhes pa ni bzlas par gsungs pa'i grangs med pa'i bzlas pa byas pas lha'i lung thob nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas zhi ba la sogs pa'i lha thams cad kyi las sgrub par byed pas na las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed
translated: By mere recitation means that by performing the countless recitations taught in the recitation, one obtains the transmission of the gods. By reciting one hundred thousand times, one accomplishes the actions of all the gods such as Śiva and so forth, so it is accomplishing all actions.

original: ces so // rang gi khyad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: ces so // rang gi khyad par gsungs pa /
translated: His own special quality is stated:

original: than pa byung ba'i dus su yang chu yi dkyil 'khor char pa 'bebs //
analyzed: than pa byung ba'i dus su yang chu yi dkyil 'khor char pa 'bebs //
translated: Even in times of drought, he sends down a rain circle of water.

original: zhes te / cho ga ni 'di yin te stobs po che'i rnal 'byor pas thams cad du dmar por bsams la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod bya'o //
analyzed: zhes te / cho ga ni 'di yin te stobs po che'i rnal 'byor pas thams cad du dmar por bsams la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod bya'o //
translated: The procedure is as follows: The practitioner of Maheśvara, imagining everything as red, should perform one hundred thousand recitations.

original: de nas rdza phor so ma btang ba la ral gri rtse brgyad pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa la rams kyi khu bas mdung can ma'i sngags aom sh'u li ni nam sv'ah'a zhes pa'i snying po bris la /
analyzed: de nas rdza phor so ma btang ba la ral gri rtse brgyad pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa la rams kyi khu bas mdung can ma'i sngags aom sh'u li ni nam sv'ah'a zhes pa'i snying po bris la /
translated: Then, on an unfired clay pot, on an eight-spoked wheel with a double-edged sword, he should write with turmeric juice the essence mantra of Śūlapāṇi, Oṃ śūlaninām svāhā, on an eight-petaled lotus.

original: gzhan so ma btang ba'i rdza phor gnyis pa dang sbyar la srad bu sngon dmar gyis dkris la mdung can ma dang / de'i sa 'dul ba bkug la legs par mchod pa byas la klu gnas pa'i mtsho 'am chu mig la sgos pa'i nang du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan so ma btang ba'i rdza phor gnyis pa dang sbyar la srad bu sngon dmar gyis dkris la mdung can ma dang / de'i sa 'dul ba bkug la legs par mchod pa byas la klu gnas pa'i mtsho 'am chu mig la sgos pa'i nang du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Joining it with another unfired clay pot, he should wrap it with a blue-red thread, summon Śūlapāṇi and his realm, and make excellent offerings. He should place it in a lake or spring where nāgas dwell.

original: bdag nyid skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs dben par me'i steng du rlung /
analyzed: bdag nyid skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs dben par me'i steng du rlung /
