original: mi bskyod pa'i rigs las byung ba'i shes rab mthar byed sku stod zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i rigs las byung ba'i shes rab mthar byed sku stod zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa /
translated: The wisdom-being Akṣobhya, who is the family of Akṣobhya, is the end-maker, with three faces and six arms above the waist,

original: sku smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i gzugs su mnyam par bzhag la ;
analyzed: sku smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i gzugs su mnyam par bzhag la ;
translated: and the form of a single-pronged vajra below the waist.

original: rang gi rdo rje las byung nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags dang ming spel bas thugs kyi rdo rje'i thugs ka nas spyi bo'i bar du sbyar ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi rdo rje las byung nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags dang ming spel bas thugs kyi rdo rje'i thugs ka nas spyi bo'i bar du sbyar ba'i phyir /
translated: Having arisen from one’s vajra, one should drive in the stake from the heart of the mind-vajra up to the head, with the mantra and name-mantra that will be given below.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi sku yi mthar //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi sku yi mthar //
translated: The stake of the three vajras is driven into the body of the end-maker.

original: gzer bar bsams nas sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: gzer bar bsams nas sbyar bar bya //
translated: Having imagined that, one should drive it in.

original: zhes so // de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen te sku rdo rje la gshin rje gshed kyi rgya chen gyis gdab bo zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes so // de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen te sku rdo rje la gshin rje gshed kyi rgya chen gyis gdab bo zhes sbyar ro //
translated: In the same way, one should drive in the stake of the end-maker of Yama with the vastness of Vairocana, the body-vajra.

original: yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can //
analyzed: yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can //
translated: Or, the one with the vajra of passion

original: zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje la padma mthar byed kyi phur bus gdab bo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje la padma mthar byed kyi phur bus gdab bo zhes pa'o //
translated: is the speech-vajra, which is driven in with the stake of Padman-teśvara.

original: de bas na rdo rje gsum yang gnon zhes so //
analyzed: de bas na rdo rje gsum yang gnon zhes so //
translated: Therefore, the three vajras are suppressed.

original: thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa la de'i rigs kyi khro bos gdab bo zhes gang las shes she na /
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa la de'i rigs kyi khro bos gdab bo zhes gang las shes she na /
translated: From what is this known?

original: le'u bco brgyad pa las /
analyzed: le'u bco brgyad pa las /
translated: From the eighteenth chapter:

original: rigs kyi bye brag tshul gyi ni //
analyzed: rigs kyi bye brag tshul gyi ni //
translated: By the method of the clan

original: rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya //
translated: one should drive in the vajra stake.

original: zhes pas mngon no //
analyzed: zhes pas mngon no //
translated: This is clear.

original: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phur bus sdang ba rnams la gdab pa gsungs pa rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phur bus sdang ba rnams la gdab pa gsungs pa rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, having driven in the stake of Amṛtakuṇḍali by the procedure previously taught, one should drive in the stake of the wrathful ones, as stated in the lines beginning “Vajra” and so on.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni bgegs mthar byed do //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni bgegs mthar byed do //
translated: Vajra Amṛtakuṇḍali is Vighuṣṭa.

original: des ci byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci byed ce na /
translated: What does he do?

original: gdug cing khro bo tshar gcod pa //
analyzed: gdug cing khro bo tshar gcod pa //
translated: He destroys the wicked and wrathful.

original: zhes te gong du gsungs pa'i bsgrub bya dang / yams nad kyis 'tshe ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te gong du gsungs pa'i bsgrub bya dang / yams nad kyis 'tshe ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The one to be accomplished previously is the one who is harmed by the plague, and so on.

original: de'i sbyor ba gong du gsungs pa lta bus bsgrub pa ni rdo rje sbyor bas bya'o //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba gong du gsungs pa lta bus bsgrub pa ni rdo rje sbyor bas bya'o //
translated: The accomplishment by the procedure previously taught is done by the vajra procedure.

original: de sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po ste mi bskyod pa la yang 'debs nus na gzhan lta ci smos zhes so //
analyzed: de sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po ste mi bskyod pa la yang 'debs nus na gzhan lta ci smos zhes so //
translated: If one is able to drive in the stake of the great being Buddha Akṣhobhya, what need is there to mention the others?

original: phur bu gdab pa'i gnas gsungs pa /
analyzed: phur bu gdab pa'i gnas gsungs pa /
translated: The place for striking the dagger is stated:

original: snying ga nas ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: snying ga nas ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “from the heart” and so forth.

analyzed: des 'di ston te sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rlung gi shing rta la zhon pa phyag na lcags kyu thogs pa 'phros nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bskul nas khrid de 'ongs pa rig ma'i padmar me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du kha dog dkar po dang
translated: This teaches that the essence of the Tathagata is summoned by the vajra of body, speech, and mind mounted on the chariot of the wind, holding an iron hook in the hand, and having emanated, and having summoned the essence of the Tathagata, it is brought to the lotus of the knowledge woman, and placed on the mandala of fire, white in color,

translated: He is Amitabha, the gnosis of discernment, which does not change in the three times.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi dri ma dag par byed pas na /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi dri ma dag par byed pas na /
translated: Since the gnosis of equality purifies the stains in the mind-streams of transmigrating beings,

original: thams cad dbang bskur te rin chen dbang phyug go //
analyzed: thams cad dbang bskur te rin chen dbang phyug go //
translated: it is the consecration of all, the lord of jewels.

original: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi bya ba mkhyen pas kun mkhyen te don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi bya ba mkhyen pas kun mkhyen te don yod grub pa'o //
translated: Since the gnosis of purposeful activity knows the purposeful activity of all transmigrating beings, it is all-knowing, the accomplished one.

original: de ltar des ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ye shes bsdus pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar des ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ye shes bsdus pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po bstan pa ste /
translated: Thus, he has taught Great Vajradhara, the essence that subsumes the gnosis of the five Tathagatas.

original: des rdo rje gsung du bka' stsal zhes so //
analyzed: des rdo rje gsung du bka' stsal zhes so //
translated: Thus, he spoke the vajra speech.

original: da ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs len pa'i rnal 'byor pas kun du dri ma med par byas pas /
analyzed: da ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs len pa'i rnal 'byor pas kun du dri ma med par byas pas /
translated: Now, the yogi who has taken up the conduct of awareness, having become completely stainless,🔽will accomplish the great seal, the feat of pacification, together with a girl of his own caste.

original: rang gi rigs kyi bu mo dang lhan cig tu zhi ba'i sbyor bas phyag rgya chen po'o dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: rang gi rigs kyi bu mo dang lhan cig tu zhi ba'i sbyor bas phyag rgya chen po'o dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: He declares the rite for accomplishing that:

original: sme sha can zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sme sha can zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The outcaste girl, etc.

original: sme sha can ni gdol pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: sme sha can ni gdol pa'i rigs so //
translated: The outcaste is the candala caste.

original: khyad par du nye bar len pas na mthu chen no //
analyzed: khyad par du nye bar len pas na mthu chen no //
translated: In particular, it is powerful because it is appropriated.

original: lo grangs bcu gnyis pa zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
analyzed: lo grangs bcu gnyis pa zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
translated: The twelve years are merely an illustration.

original: mya ngan las sog le ltar gcod pa yod kyi bar du gzung ba la 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: mya ngan las sog le ltar gcod pa yod kyi bar du gzung ba la 'gal ba med do //
translated: There is no contradiction in taking it to be as long as there is a saw-like grief.

original: bram ze dang skye bo la sogs pas dben pa'i gnas su'o //🔽phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa la khyad par du /
analyzed: bram ze dang skye bo la sogs pas dben pa'i gnas su'o // phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa la khyad par du /
translated: In a place that is secluded from brahmins, people, and so forth.

original: sgrub pa pos ni gnyis pas rtag tu bsgrub //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos ni gnyis pas rtag tu bsgrub //
translated: In order to accomplish the Great Seal, the practitioner should always practice with the second.

original: ces te zla ba drug la sogs pa'i rim pas ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ces te zla ba drug la sogs pa'i rim pas ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it in the sequence of six months and so forth?

original: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said vajra, and so forth.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The vajra maṇḍala is Akṣobhya.

original: de'i rnal 'byor gyis rab tu bsgoms pa yis zhes so //
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor gyis rab tu bsgoms pa yis zhes so //
translated: By the yoga of that, one should meditate.

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: bshad gci zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bshad gci zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said feces, and so forth.

original: de yang gong gi gnas su bshad gci dam tshig la sogs pas zhes te /
analyzed: de yang gong gi gnas su bshad gci dam tshig la sogs pas zhes te /
translated: Moreover, in the previously explained place, with the pledge of feces, and so forth.

original: sa stegs bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga'i mgo ma yang bzang pos byug cing des cho ga bzhin du zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sa stegs bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga'i mgo ma yang bzang pos byug cing des cho ga bzhin du zhes pa ni /
translated: The platform is anointed with the five nectars and the five meats, and with the five excellent ones.

original: rtag pa las @89b byung ba'i gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa bsgom zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rtag pa las @89b byung ba'i gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa bsgom zhes pa'o //
translated: By that, one should meditate on the celestial mansion arisen from the syllable bhrūṃ.

original: de bas na /🔽dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya //
analyzed: de bas na / dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya //
translated: Therefore,🔽one should make the maṇḍala square and even.

original: zhes te sgo bzhi dang rta babs bzhi la sogs pas mdzes par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te sgo bzhi dang rta babs bzhi la sogs pas mdzes par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: One should make it beautiful with four gates, four porticos, and so forth.

original: gong gi bu mo'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /🔽mtshan nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o//
analyzed: gong gi bu mo'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa / mtshan nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o//
translated: The above describes the characteristics of the girl.

original: mtshan nyid thams cad ces pa ni 'dod pa'i mtshan ma thams cad yongs su dag par rdzogs pa /
analyzed: mtshan nyid thams cad ces pa ni 'dod pa'i mtshan ma thams cad yongs su dag par rdzogs pa /
translated: “All characteristics” means that all the signs of desire are completely pure and perfect.

original: de nyid kyis na rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes pa'o //
translated: By that, she is very beautiful and her face is also beautiful.

original: de rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes pa ste /
translated: She is “completely perfect with all ornaments,”

original: gdub bu la sogs pa dang rigs lnga la sogs pas so //
analyzed: gdub bu la sogs pa dang rigs lnga la sogs pas so //
translated: with bracelets and so forth, and with the five families and so forth.

original: bang bar bzhag nas bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bang bar bzhag nas bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate, placing her on one’s lap.

original: zhes te / de'i 'dod pa la longs spyod cing phrin las la gnas pa'i tshe yid la dmigs pa thob pa'i phyir na pang par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te / de'i 'dod pa la longs spyod cing phrin las la gnas pa'i tshe yid la dmigs pa thob pa'i phyir na pang par gzhag pa'o //
translated: Thus, when one enjoys the desired object and abides in the rite, one is placed in the lap, because one has attained the mental object.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo yis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo yis //
translated: The wheel of the five mandalas

original: sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgoms //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgoms //
translated: is meditated on in the form of the Buddha.

original: zhes te rigs lnga la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang bsgoms nas tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes te rigs lnga la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang bsgoms nas tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having also meditated on the mandalas of the five families, etc., in order to complete the accumulations,

original: sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyis gsang //
analyzed: sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyis gsang //
translated: the one with the mantra wheel should meditate on the secret.

original: zhes pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i lha mo bcu'i ngo bo'i mchod pa nyams dga' ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i lha mo bcu'i ngo bo'i mchod pa nyams dga' ba ste /
translated: This is the delightful worship with the nature of the ten uncommon goddesses.

original: sa bcu mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir bsgom par bya zhes so //
analyzed: sa bcu mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir bsgom par bya zhes so //
translated: In order to perfect the ten stages, one should meditate.

original: des ni ji skad du gsungs pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes so //🔽rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub pa gsungs nas /
analyzed: des ni ji skad du gsungs pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes so // rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub pa gsungs nas /
translated: Thus, one will attain what has been stated.🔽Having taught the practice of the vajra family,

original: da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: now, the practice of the great seal of the yoga of Vairocana is taught.

original: sku gsung thugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The body, speech, and mind and so on.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
translated: The vajra of body, speech, and mind

original: zhes pa ni de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
translated: means that they are empowered.

original: longs spyod gzhan yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: longs spyod gzhan yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the other enjoyments.

original: de nyid kyang rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku zhes te de'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
analyzed: de nyid kyang rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku zhes te de'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
translated: That very thing is the body of Great Vairochana means by the yoga of that.

original: bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of mantra and concentration,

original: zhes pa ni bzlas pa ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i bsam gtan gyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bzlas pa ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i bsam gtan gyis gnas pa'o //
translated: mantra repetition means abiding by the concentration of engagement and so on.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'phror 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'phror 'gyur //
translated: One becomes the light of the Buddha

original: zhes pa ni rig 'dzin lta bu ma yin te de dang rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rig 'dzin lta bu ma yin te de dang rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa'o zhes so //
translated: means that one is not like a knowledge-holder, but becomes of the same nature as that.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'dis dgongs pa'i tshig dkrugs te gong gi sme sha can gyi bu mo @90a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'dis dgongs pa'i tshig dkrugs te gong gi sme sha can gyi bu mo @90a * //
translated: This Bhagavān has scrambled the intended words. The daughter of a low-caste man

original: ni mi bskyod pa dang sbyor ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ni mi bskyod pa dang sbyor ba'i phyir /
translated: is to be applied to Akṣhobhya.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of Vajrasattva,

original: zhes so // bco blag mkhan zhes pa ni kha dog bsgyur ba'i bu mo ste gong ma ltar mthu chen te /
analyzed: zhes so // bco blag mkhan zhes pa ni kha dog bsgyur ba'i bu mo ste gong ma ltar mthu chen te /
translated: The “washerwoman” is a girl of the washerman caste, and is powerful as before.

original: mdog dkar mo ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs dang sbyar zhes so //
analyzed: mdog dkar mo ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs dang sbyar zhes so //
translated: “White complexion” is connected with the family of Vairocana.

original: autpala mthing ga'i mdog ces pa ni sme sha can gyi bu mo'i mdog ste de lta bu mi bskyod pa dang sbyar bas na /
analyzed: autpala mthing ga'i mdog ces pa ni sme sha can gyi bu mo'i mdog ste de lta bu mi bskyod pa dang sbyar bas na /
translated: “The color of the blue lotus” is the color of the girl of the caṇḍāla caste, and since that is connected with Akṣobhya,

original: 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu sgrub //
analyzed: 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu sgrub //
translated: “the like is always accomplished.”

original: ces pa'o // sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni byas nas zhes pa ni dpung pas 'khyud pa la sogs pa rtsa bskul ba'i bya ba yan chad kyi bar du byas nas dngos grub bsgrub pa'i las rnams brtsam par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: ces pa'o // sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni byas nas zhes pa ni dpung pas 'khyud pa la sogs pa rtsa bskul ba'i bya ba yan chad kyi bar du byas nas dngos grub bsgrub pa'i las rnams brtsam par bya'o zhes so //
translated: “Having performed the rite of union” means that, having performed the embrace with the arms and so forth up to the activity of stimulating the root, one should begin the activity of achieving power.

original: 'di ni 'khor lo'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o zhes so //
analyzed: 'di ni 'khor lo'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o zhes so //
translated: This is the pledge that is very difficult to transgress, since it is not to be transgressed by the yogin of the wheel family.

original: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
translated: The result of the yoga of Akṣobhya is stated:

original: de ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “That” and so forth.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur //
translated: One becomes like the light of Vajrasattva.

original: zhes pa ni gong ma ltar de dang rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gong ma ltar de dang rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa'o zhes so //
translated: As above, one becomes of the same nature as that.

original: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that a practitioner of Amitābha accomplishes the Great Seal.

original: rgyal po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The king, etc.

original: chos rnams kun dang mtshungs zhes pa ni chos thams cad rnam par dag cing 'dzin pa'o //🔽'dod dang thar ba rab grol byed //
analyzed: chos rnams kun dang mtshungs zhes pa ni chos thams cad rnam par dag cing 'dzin pa'o // 'dod dang thar ba rab grol byed //
translated: All dharmas are the same means that all dharmas are pure and grasped.🔽Desire is the liberator of liberation.

original: ces pa ni 'dod pa nyid thar pa dang grol ba'i lam du byed pa'i gtso bo'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni 'dod pa nyid thar pa dang grol ba'i lam du byed pa'i gtso bo'o //
translated: Desire itself is the principal path to liberation and freedom.

original: de nyid rdo rje chos te 'od dpag med do //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje chos te 'od dpag med do //
translated: That is Vajradharma, Amitābha.

original: de rnam par bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: de rnam par bsgoms pas so //
translated: By meditating on that.

original: gang dang lhan cig tu zhe na /
analyzed: gang dang lhan cig tu zhe na /
translated: With what?

original: gar mkhan zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
analyzed: gar mkhan zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
translated: The dancer, etc. It is easy to understand.

original: de dang ji skad du bshad pa'i cho gas bsgrubs na de'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
analyzed: de dang ji skad du bshad pa'i cho gas bsgrubs na de'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
translated: If one accomplishes that with the previously explained method, the result is stated:

original: de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag po zhes te gong ma ltar 'od dpag med dang rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa zhes so //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag po zhes te gong ma ltar 'od dpag med dang rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa zhes so //
translated: He is the lord of Vajradharma, and as above, he is of the same nature as Amitābha.

original: de ji ltar bu zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur //
translated: He abides in the ten stages.

original: zhes te gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa sgeg pa'i ros brgyan pa'i lha mo bcu ni 'bras bur gyur pa /
analyzed: zhes te gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa sgeg pa'i ros brgyan pa'i lha mo bcu ni 'bras bur gyur pa /
translated: The ten goddesses, such as Rūpavajrā, who are adorned with the nectar of charm, are the result.

original: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa bcu rnams par dag pa'i tshul ni sa bcu zhes bya la /
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa bcu rnams par dag pa'i tshul ni sa bcu zhes bya la /
translated: The ten stages, such as the Joyous, which are the essence of generosity and so forth, are the pure manner of the ten stages.

original: de la gnas pa ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan @90b pa'o ;
analyzed: de la gnas pa ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan @90b pa'o ;
translated: Abiding in them is taught as the lord of desire.

original: / gsung nyid mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste de 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: / gsung nyid mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste de 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Since speech itself is not transgressed, it is the commitment, and he holds it.

original: gsung gi rigs kyi bdag por gyur pas na /
analyzed: gsung gi rigs kyi bdag por gyur pas na /
translated: Since he is the lord of the speech family,

original: mnga' dbang dam pa kun gyi mchog / ces so //
analyzed: mnga' dbang dam pa kun gyi mchog / ces so //
translated: he is the supreme of all sacred powers.

original: rang gi rigs kyi bu mo med kyang gzhan dang gzung ba 'gal ba med par gsungs pa bram ze zhes pa la sogs pa'o//
analyzed: rang gi rigs kyi bu mo med kyang gzhan dang gzung ba 'gal ba med par gsungs pa bram ze zhes pa la sogs pa'o//
translated: Even though he does not have a daughter of his own family, it is not contradictory to take another, as is stated in the line “the brahmin” and so forth.

original: rigs la sogs pa ni khyad par du bkra shis pas smos pa ste /
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa ni khyad par du bkra shis pas smos pa ste /
translated: The family and so forth are mentioned because they are especially auspicious.

original: don du na gnyis su med pa'i spyod pa la phyag rgya chen po 'byung bas na 'gal ba med pa'o //
analyzed: don du na gnyis su med pa'i spyod pa la phyag rgya chen po 'byung bas na 'gal ba med pa'o //
translated: In fact, there is no contradiction, since the great seal arises in the conduct of nonduality.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: sems can bsam pa la brten nas //
analyzed: sems can bsam pa la brten nas //
translated: Based on the intentions of sentient beings,

original: tshad la sogs pa nges byas yin //
analyzed: tshad la sogs pa nges byas yin //
translated: the limits and so forth are determined.

original: thabs shes las 'byung dngos grub la //
analyzed: thabs shes las 'byung dngos grub la //
translated: In the power that arises from method and wisdom,

original: rigs sogs nges pas ci zhig yod //
analyzed: rigs sogs nges pas ci zhig yod //
translated: what is the point of determining the family and so forth?

original: ces te 'jig rten sgron ma las bshad do //
analyzed: ces te 'jig rten sgron ma las bshad do //
translated: This is explained in the Lokapradipika.

original: rdo rje chos zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon tsa ma ste /
analyzed: rdo rje chos zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon tsa ma ste /
translated: The phrase Vajra Dharma is merely an illustration.

original: gnyis kyis kyang bsgrubs na gsang ba thob par byed ces so //
analyzed: gnyis kyis kyang bsgrubs na gsang ba thob par byed ces so //
translated: If one accomplishes with both, one causes the secret to be attained.

original: phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i nang gi dus bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i nang gi dus bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the inner time of accomplishing the great seal,

original: rdo rje nyi ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: it is said, the vajra sun, and so forth.

original: phyin ci log gi ma rig pa'i mun pa 'joms pa'i phyir gsang ba'i rdo rje ste de nyid nyi ma'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log gi ma rig pa'i mun pa 'joms pa'i phyir gsang ba'i rdo rje ste de nyid nyi ma'o //
translated: Because it destroys the darkness of inverted ignorance, it is the secret vajra, which is the sun.

original: nub nas zhes pa ni nye bar 'grub par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nub nas zhes pa ni nye bar 'grub par gyur pa'o //
translated: The phrase having set means having become accomplished.

original: sgrub pa kun du brtsam par bya //
analyzed: sgrub pa kun du brtsam par bya //
translated: One should undertake all the practice.

original: zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo bde ba chen po sgrub par byed pa'i ngo bo brtsams nas zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo bde ba chen po sgrub par byed pa'i ngo bo brtsams nas zhes so //
translated: This is the meaning: having undertaken the practice of the nature of Akshobhya, the nature of the Great Bliss.

original: skya rengs ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: skya rengs ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The dawn is the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: de 'char ba ni gnas rnams nas rtsa g-yo zhing bdag nyid kyi char gnas pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: de 'char ba ni gnas rnams nas rtsa g-yo zhing bdag nyid kyi char gnas pa'i dus su'o //
translated: Its rising is the time when the channels move from the places and abide in one's own part.

original: bsgrub pa'i mchog ni phyag rgya chen po ste de 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i mchog ni phyag rgya chen po ste de 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: The supreme practice is the Great Seal, and that will be accomplished.

original: de rnams kyi 'bras bu bya ba dang bcas par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'bras bu bya ba dang bcas par gsungs pa /
translated: The result of those is stated with the verb:

original: rgyan rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The ornaments, etc.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog bsgoms na //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog bsgoms na //
translated: Having meditated on the supreme Vajrasattva,

original: zhes pa ni rang gi lha'i ngo bo ste de bsgom pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rang gi lha'i ngo bo ste de bsgom pa'o zhes so //
translated: this is the nature of one's own deity, and that is the meditation.

original: 'bras bu yang 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The result is also this, etc.

original: sangs rgyas mtshan gyi zhes pa ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad kyis mtshan par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mtshan gyi zhes pa ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad kyis mtshan par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: The name of the Buddha is the name and the major marks as stated.

original: dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du //
analyzed: dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du //
translated: The size of the land is one hundred yojanas.🔽

original: zhes pa ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
translated: The extent of a hundred leagues is merely an illustration.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mtshan dang dpe byed de'i 'od kyis snang bar byed ces pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mtshan dang dpe byed de'i 'od kyis snang bar byed ces pa'o //
translated: It is said that the light of that sign and mark illuminates all world systems.

original: bya ba gang gis she na /
analyzed: bya ba gang gis she na /
translated: By what action?

original: dbang po gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽sbyor ba @91a * //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o // sbyor ba @91a * //
translated: By the two organs, etc.

original: thams cad ces pa ni der gtogs pa'i sbyor ba mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhes so //
analyzed: thams cad ces pa ni der gtogs pa'i sbyor ba mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhes so //
translated: All the practices are for the sake of actualizing the practices that belong there.

original: de'i bza' ba'i dam tshig kyang rdo rje can zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bza' ba'i dam tshig kyang rdo rje can zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: His pledge of food is the vajra holder, etc.

original: don gyis 'jug bsdu ba /
analyzed: don gyis 'jug bsdu ba /
translated: The meaning is included in the engagement.

original: bshad gci zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bshad gci zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Feces, urine, etc.

original: de'i don bshad gci la sogs pa'i bdud rtsis tshim par byed cing khams rgyas par byas nas dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i bde ba chen po la rol bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnas zhi ba ni chos kyi sku ste /
analyzed: de'i don bshad gci la sogs pa'i bdud rtsis tshim par byed cing khams rgyas par byas nas dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i bde ba chen po la rol bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnas zhi ba ni chos kyi sku ste /
translated: The meaning of that is that he is satisfied with the nectar of feces, urine, etc., and having increased the elements, he enjoys the great bliss of the union of the two organs. The abode of all the buddhas and bodhisattvas is the peace of the dharmakāya.

original: de la de nyid bla na med pa zhes bya ste bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de la de nyid bla na med pa zhes bya ste bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: That is called the unsurpassed reality, and one will attain the unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: Desire is form and so forth.

original: de nyid thar pa'i lam las mi 'da' ba'i phyir thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rje ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid thar pa'i lam las mi 'da' ba'i phyir thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rje ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Since that is not beyond the path of liberation, it is the pledge of liberation, the vajra, the vajra holder.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i bu mo bdag gir bya ba'i phyir dgug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i bu mo bdag gir bya ba'i phyir dgug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: In order to take possession of the girl as explained, he declares the rite of summoning:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: dam tshig chen po zhes pa ni me long lta bu'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po zhes pa ni me long lta bu'o //
translated: The great pledge is the mirror-like one.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje khro bo ste rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje khro bo ste rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes so //
translated: That itself is the vajra wrath, and having entered into the meditative concentration of Vairochana, etc.

original: kun du skrag par byed pa'i rdo rje khro bo ni de'i rigs kyi khro bo ni rdo rje gshin rje gshed kyi sngags phyung ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: kun du skrag par byed pa'i rdo rje khro bo ni de'i rigs kyi khro bo ni rdo rje gshin rje gshed kyi sngags phyung ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: The vajra wrath that terrifies all is the wrath of that family, the vajra Yamantaka mantra.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: aom zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Om, etc.

original: sngags de la sarba sha tr'um n'a sha ya zhes pa bsal nas /
analyzed: sngags de la sarba sha tr'um n'a sha ya zhes pa bsal nas /
translated: Having removed sarva śatrum nāśaya from that mantra,

original: bu mo che ge mo satvam bha ya zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: bu mo che ge mo satvam bha ya zhes sbyar ro //
translated: one should add the name of the girl, “so and so, stambhaya.”

original: sbyor ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: sbyor ba gsungs pa /
translated: The application is stated:

original: dug ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dug ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “poison” and so forth.

original: de'i don ni 'di lta ste ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa'i gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas dug dang khrag sbyar nas yang lan tshva dang ske tshe yang sbyar ba'i rdzas kyis lus la sogs pa khro zhing po son 'cha' la sogs pa tsher ma'i me
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di lta ste ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa'i gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas dug dang khrag sbyar nas yang lan tshva dang ske tshe yang sbyar ba'i rdzas kyis lus la sogs pa khro zhing po son 'cha' la sogs pa tsher ma'i me
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: A yogin of Yamāri who has done the practice just as it is, having mixed poison and blood, again mixes the substances salt and black mustard seed, and with an angry mind, with the fire of a thorn bush, and so forth, burns the effigy of the body, and so forth, of the girl.

original: bus la yi ge h'um gi lce dang ldan pa'i gshin rje gshed kyi zhal du bsams nas gong gi sngags dang / bu mo'i ming dang tshig tu bcas pa brjod cing /
analyzed: bus la yi ge h'um gi lce dang ldan pa'i gshin rje gshed kyi zhal du bsams nas gong gi sngags dang / bu mo'i ming dang tshig tu bcas pa brjod cing /
translated: Having visualized the fire as the mouth of Yamāri, endowed with the tongue of the syllable hūṃ, one should recite the above mantra, together with the name of the girl and the words,🔽“so and so, stambhaya.”

original: nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na shis par sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i shes rab can gyis mngon spyod kyi hom khung gru gsum du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bu mo dgug pa'i phyir nyi ma gsum du bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na shis par sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i shes rab can gyis mngon spyod kyi hom khung gru gsum du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bu mo dgug pa'i phyir nyi ma gsum du bya'o zhes so //
translated: The wise one who is endowed with the union of the sun at noon or midnight should perform the fire sacrifice of eight thousand oblations in the triangular hearth of the rite of assault for the purpose of summoning a girl for three days.

original: des bskal pa grangs med gsum du yang zhes te /
analyzed: des bskal pa grangs med gsum du yang zhes te /
translated: By that, even for three incalculable eons

original: de'i tshes thub na de tsam gyi bar du yang 'dul bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: de'i tshes thub na de tsam gyi bar du yang 'dul bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: if one is able, one will tame for that long.

original: sangs rgyas ni sku @91b rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni sku @91b rdo rje'o //
translated: Buddha is the vajra body,

original: chos 'dzin pa ni gsung rdo rje'o //
analyzed: chos 'dzin pa ni gsung rdo rje'o //
translated: the Dharma holder is the vajra speech,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni thugs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni thugs rdo rje'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is the vajra mind,

original: gzhan ni gong ma ltar ro //
analyzed: gzhan ni gong ma ltar ro //
translated: and the others are as above.

original: sngags de kho nas gzhan dag gis dgug tu gzhug pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: sngags de kho nas gzhan dag gis dgug tu gzhug pa gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that one should summon others with just that mantra:

original: bcu bzhi pa'am zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa'am zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The fourteenth and so forth.

original: de yang gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas mar ngo'i tshes gnyis la dur khrod kyi gsol ba blangs la /
analyzed: de yang gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas mar ngo'i tshes gnyis la dur khrod kyi gsol ba blangs la /
translated: Further, one who is endowed with the yoga of Yamantaka, on the second day of the waning phase, should take up the vow in a charnel ground.

original: de gong gi sngags bu mo che ge mo bdag la byin ces cho ga bzhin du sngags stong rtsa brgyad btab nas /
analyzed: de gong gi sngags bu mo che ge mo bdag la byin ces cho ga bzhin du sngags stong rtsa brgyad btab nas /
translated: Having enchanted a thousand and eight times with the mantra, “Give me so-and-so’s daughter,” according to the rite,

original: des srin po la sogs pa gang gi ming shing leb la sogs pa la bris pas nges khrid nas 'ongs nas rtag tu brten par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: des srin po la sogs pa gang gi ming shing leb la sogs pa la bris pas nges khrid nas 'ongs nas rtag tu brten par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: he will definitely lead to one’s presence whoever’s name is written on a wooden tablet, etc., and will always be obedient.

original: da ni las phran tshegs kyis gsad pa bzhi gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni las phran tshegs kyis gsad pa bzhi gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the four killings by minor rites are taught,

original: sngags zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with “mantra,” etc.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i dru khrod kyi sol bas drug khrod kyis las dgra'i gzugs brnyan byas la bkug ste bcu la /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i dru khrod kyi sol bas drug khrod kyis las dgra'i gzugs brnyan byas la bkug ste bcu la /
translated: Having enchanted with the mantra just explained, one should make an effigy of the enemy with charnel ground char, and summon him and kill him.

original: mgo cad do'i bsam pas gang yang rung ba'i ri mo bris zhes te /
analyzed: mgo cad do'i bsam pas gang yang rung ba'i ri mo bris zhes te /
translated: One should draw a picture of anyone with the intention of killing him,

original: spu gri lta bur bsams la mgul pa la ri mo bris pas mgo chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spu gri lta bur bsams la mgul pa la ri mo bris pas mgo chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: and having imagined that the picture is like a razor, one should draw a line on his throat. He will be beheaded.

original: tho ba zhes pa ni gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor bas gshin rje gshed las gyur pa'i tho ba bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas bsgoms la /
analyzed: tho ba zhes pa ni gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor bas gshin rje gshed las gyur pa'i tho ba bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas bsgoms la /
translated: The hammer is the hammer arisen from Yamantaka, which is meditated upon by the yoga of Yamantaka.

original: mdun du bsgrub bya'i lus bsams la tho ba des bsnun cing phab na g-yas la sogs par lhung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdun du bsgrub bya'i lus bsams la tho ba des bsnun cing phab na g-yas la sogs par lhung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one imagines the body of the victim in front and strikes it with the hammer, it will fall to the right and so forth.

original: h'um zhes pa ni lha khro bo'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi lag pa h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms la de lag na rdo rje ste de 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: h'um zhes pa ni lha khro bo'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi lag pa h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms la de lag na rdo rje ste de 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The vajra is the five-pointed vajra arisen from the hum, which is meditated upon by the yoga of the wrathful deity in one's hand.

original: des mdun du bsgrub bya'i lus la bsnun na gdug pa'i lus srin po la sogs pas 'jig par 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: des mdun du bsgrub bya'i lus la bsnun na gdug pa'i lus srin po la sogs pas 'jig par 'gyur zhes so //
translated: If one strikes the body of the victim in front with that, the body of the evildoer will be destroyed by rakshasas and so forth.

original: rdo rgyus zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i sbyor bas bzlas pa'i rdo rgyus dang / sol bas bsgrub par bya ba skyes pa'am bud med kyi gzugs dur khrod kyi sa la bris la bdag gi lag par h'um las byung ba'i sta re bsams nas mgul bar brgyab pas mid pa bcad pa ste kha zas mi thar pa'i nad kyis 'dzin to //
analyzed: rdo rgyus zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i sbyor bas bzlas pa'i rdo rgyus dang / sol bas bsgrub par bya ba skyes pa'am bud med kyi gzugs dur khrod kyi sa la bris la bdag gi lag par h'um las byung ba'i sta re bsams nas mgul bar brgyab pas mid pa bcad pa ste kha zas mi thar pa'i nad kyis 'dzin to //
translated: Having written the form of the man or woman to be accomplished with charcoal on charnel ground earth, one should imagine a hatchet arisen from HŪṀ in one's hand, and by striking the throat, one cuts off the windpipe, and one holds the victim with the disease of an inability to swallow food.

original: de rnams kyi sbyor ba'i mthu gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyi sbyor ba'i mthu gsungs pa /
translated: The power of the application of those is stated:

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Buddhas, etc.

original: sangs rgyas kyi btsun mo spyan ma la sogs pa yang 'chi na gzhan lta ci smos pa'o //🔽da ni klu bskul @92a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi btsun mo spyan ma la sogs pa yang 'chi na gzhan lta ci smos pa'o // da ni klu bskul @92a * //
translated: If the Buddhas' queens such as Locanā die, what need to speak of others?

original: bas char dbab pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /🔽las kyi rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bas char dbab pa'i cho ga gsungs pa / las kyi rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, the rite of summoning the nāgas and causing them to rain is stated:🔽The Karmavajra, etc.

original: de yang mdog ser po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
analyzed: de yang mdog ser po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
translated: One should imagine oneself as the Karmavajra-holder, yellow in color, in union with the consort.

original: char dbab pa'i phyogs gcig pa'am thams cad kyi steng du h'um las byung ba'i las kyi rdo rje mdog ser po 'od rab tu 'bar ba me stag mang po 'khrigs pas mngon par 'dod pa'i phyogs khebs par bsams la /
analyzed: char dbab pa'i phyogs gcig pa'am thams cad kyi steng du h'um las byung ba'i las kyi rdo rje mdog ser po 'od rab tu 'bar ba me stag mang po 'khrigs pas mngon par 'dod pa'i phyogs khebs par bsams la /
translated: One should visualize a yellow Karma-Vajra arisen from a HUM, blazing with light, covered with many sparks, covering the region of the sky which is the direction of the rain.

original: de'i dbus su h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga 'greng bu me lta bu bsams la /
analyzed: de'i dbus su h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga 'greng bu me lta bu bsams la /
translated: In the middle of that one should visualize a five-pointed vajra arisen from a HUM, standing upright, like fire.

original: de'i bum pa la sbyor ba de nyid kyis 'dug ste /
analyzed: de'i bum pa la sbyor ba de nyid kyis 'dug ste /
translated: One should sit in the vase of that with that very union.🔽One should visualize the direction covered with yellow light rays arisen from the pores of the skin.

original: ba spu'i bu ga las byung ba'i 'od zer ser pos phyogs thams cad khyab par bsams nas de lta bus ni mngon par 'dod pa'am /
analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga las byung ba'i 'od zer ser pos phyogs thams cad khyab par bsams nas de lta bus ni mngon par 'dod pa'am /
translated: By that, the rain will fall outside of the desired place or

original: thams cad las phyi rol du 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad las phyi rol du 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: outside of everywhere.🔽One should visualize the ground itself blazing with light rays.

original: sa gzhi nyid 'od zer 'bar ba bsams te klu thams cad bskam par bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: sa gzhi nyid 'od zer 'bar ba bsams te klu thams cad bskam par bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: The drying up of all the nagas is the instruction.

original: rtse gcig pa nyams su myong ba dang bcas pa ni bsgom par mi nus pa dag la cho ga 'di lta ste gong du bshad pa'i bri ba'i rdzas kyis dur khrod kyi ras la padma 'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad kyi rang rang gi sa bon bris la
analyzed: rtse gcig pa nyams su myong ba dang bcas pa ni bsgom par mi nus pa dag la cho ga 'di lta ste gong du bshad pa'i bri ba'i rdzas kyis dur khrod kyi ras la padma 'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad kyi rang rang gi sa bon bris la
translated: For those who are unable to meditate on the one-pointed [stage] together with the experience, there is this rite: On cloth from a charnel ground, with the substances described above, draw eight lotus petals with the individual seed syllables of the eight nāgas.

original: / de'i snying po la phat gnyis kyi bar du bam bris te bkug la /
analyzed: / de'i snying po la phat gnyis kyi bar du bam bris te bkug la /
translated: In the center, draw vaṃ between two phaṭs.

original: yang ras ma gnyis pa la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i rdo rje rgya gram ser po'i lte ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa bris la /
analyzed: yang ras ma gnyis pa la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i rdo rje rgya gram ser po'i lte ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa bris la /
translated: On another piece of cloth, draw a blazing, flaming, yellow vajra cross with a five-pronged vajra in the center, consecrated with hūṃ.

original: dang po'i ras bkan te bting pa'i steng du /
analyzed: dang po'i ras bkan te bting pa'i steng du /
translated: Turn the first cloth face down and lay it out.

original: gnyis pa kha sbubs te rdo leb la sogs pas mnan la bzhag na char pa 'gog pa'i cho ga yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa kha sbubs te rdo leb la sogs pas mnan la bzhag na char pa 'gog pa'i cho ga yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Turn the second face up and place it on top. Press it down with a flat stone, and so on. This is the rite for stopping rain.

original: tshon 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i skabs su bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: tshon 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i skabs su bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: The rite for pacifying obstructors at the time of spreading the colors, and so on, is taught:

original: dkyil 'khor dag ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dag ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “In the maṇḍala,” and so on.

original: sogs pa'i sgras bsdus pa chu dang sprul la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras bsdus pa chu dang sprul la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on means water, snakes, and so on.

original: mche ba'i phyag rgyas zhes pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: mche ba'i phyag rgyas zhes pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: The mudra of the fangs is the great mudra of Amrtakundali.

original: bcing ba ni cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms nas zhes so //
analyzed: bcing ba ni cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms nas zhes so //
translated: Binding is meditating just according to the rite.

original: gdug pa'i dgra ni zhes pa ni bgegs rnams kyi gdug pa'i dgra ste /
analyzed: gdug pa'i dgra ni zhes pa ni bgegs rnams kyi gdug pa'i dgra ste /
translated: The wicked enemies are the wicked enemies of the obstructors.

original: sngags kyi rgyal po gong du gsungs pa'i la ma h'a pa ti dza'i bi ha na ta ka ra zhes pa bsal nas che ge mo gnod byed ces pa dran par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi rgyal po gong du gsungs pa'i la ma h'a pa ti dza'i bi ha na ta ka ra zhes pa bsal nas che ge mo gnod byed ces pa dran par bya'o //
translated: The mantra king previously stated is “lamahapatidzvihantakara.” Having removed that, one should recall “so-and-so, the harm-doer.”

original: de'i mthu gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i mthu gsungs pa /
translated: The power of that is stated:

original: @92b sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: @92b sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The buddhas” and so on.

original: de rnams kyi sprul pa yang 'jig par 'gyur na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sprul pa yang 'jig par 'gyur na zhes pa'o //
translated: If even their emanations are destroyed,

original: gzhan dag ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni go sla'o //
translated: the others are easy to understand.

original: sngags de kho na'am /
analyzed: sngags de kho na'am /
translated: That mantra itself

original: gzhan gyi yi ge sv'a h'a bor la las dang mthun par phat gzhug par gsungs pa de la 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi yi ge sv'a h'a bor la las dang mthun par phat gzhug par gsungs pa de la 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: or, having removed the syllable svaha of another, it is stated that one should insert phat in accordance with the rite. That is stated in “this” and so on.

original: ye shes sems dpa' zhes pa ni gzugs rnam par gzhig pa ste /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' zhes pa ni gzugs rnam par gzhig pa ste /
translated: The “gnosis being” is the form that is destroyed.

original: de'i sbyor pa yis zhes pa ni bar gyi srid pa'i sems sngon du 'gro ba'i zla bar zhu pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de'i sbyor pa yis zhes pa ni bar gyi srid pa'i sems sngon du 'gro ba'i zla bar zhu pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
translated: “By that yoga” means that one should meditate in the center of the moon-disk form that is the melted form preceded by the mind of the intermediate state.

original: sngags shes pa yis zhes pa ni sbyor ba shes pas tshad med pa bzhi lha mo bzhi'i gzugs su phyung ste /
analyzed: sngags shes pa yis zhes pa ni sbyor ba shes pas tshad med pa bzhi lha mo bzhi'i gzugs su phyung ste /
translated: “By one who knows the mantra” means that one who knows the yoga should emanate the four immeasurables in the form of the four goddesses.

original: bden bral la sogs pa'i gnas bzhir m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i bud med go rims bzhin du bzhag nas bskul bar bsam mo zhes so //
analyzed: bden bral la sogs pa'i gnas bzhir m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i bud med go rims bzhin du bzhag nas bskul bar bsam mo zhes so //
translated: Having placed Māmakī and so on in the four places such as the southwest and so on, one should imagine that they are summoned.

original: bud med de dag kyang rgyan dang mtshan thams cad rdzogs pa'o zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: bud med de dag kyang rgyan dang mtshan thams cad rdzogs pa'o zhes sbyar ro //
translated: One should also add that those women are complete with all ornaments and signs.

original: rigs lnga dang ldan pa'i lha mo dang bdag gi yan lag gnyis dag par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: rigs lnga dang ldan pa'i lha mo dang bdag gi yan lag gnyis dag par bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that the goddesses endowed with the five clans and one’s own limbs are purified.

original: padmo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: padmo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: [This is] stated by “lotus” and so on.

original: de yang rang gi rigs kyi bu mo'i padma la rdo rje bzhag pas rgyas par byas nas zhes so //
analyzed: de yang rang gi rigs kyi bu mo'i padma la rdo rje bzhag pas rgyas par byas nas zhes so //
translated: Moreover, having expanded the lotus of one’s daughter of one’s own clan by placing the vajra there,

original: bskul ba'i las la gnas pa'i padmo de yang sngags 'dis bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bskul ba'i las la gnas pa'i padmo de yang sngags 'dis bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on that lotus abiding in the action of urging with this mantra.

original: h'um zhes so //
analyzed: h'um zhes so //
translated: Hum!🔽🔽

original: des padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar ser pos mtshan pa gcig tu bsam mo //
analyzed: des padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar ser pos mtshan pa gcig tu bsam mo //
translated: By that, one should imagine a red lotus with eight petals marked with a yellow stamen.

original: gzhan yang sngags des 'od zer lnga rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga nor bu dmar skya bar bsgoms nas /
analyzed: gzhan yang sngags des 'od zer lnga rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga nor bu dmar skya bar bsgoms nas /
translated: Moreover, having meditated on a five-pronged vajra blazing with five-colored light and a reddish-white gem,

original: gzod sbyor ba bsgom zhes te gong ma ltar ro //
analyzed: gzod sbyor ba bsgom zhes te gong ma ltar ro //
translated: one should meditate on the union as before.

original: da ni skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su phan yon gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su phan yon gsungs pa /
translated: Now, at the time of dawn, the benefits are stated:

original: rang lus zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang lus zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “One’s own body” and so forth.

original: rang lus ni rang gi phung po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang lus ni rang gi phung po la sogs pa'o //
translated: One’s own body is one’s own aggregates and so forth.

original: ngag sems rdo rje zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi gru gsum dang ldan pa'i padmar zla ba lta bur phab na byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: ngag sems rdo rje zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi gru gsum dang ldan pa'i padmar zla ba lta bur phab na byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: “ Vajra of speech and mind” is endowed with a triangle having the nature of the three vajras. If one descends like the moon into the lotus, one will attain enlightenment.

original: ji lta bu'i byang chub ce na /
analyzed: ji lta bu'i byang chub ce na /
translated: What kind of enlightenment?

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing //
translated: Like the light of Vairocana,

original: zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thob nas de'i rigs can rnams la snang ba'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thob nas de'i rigs can rnams la snang ba'i byang chub bo //
translated: having attained the mandala circle of the vajra body, the enlightenment of those of that family is the light.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che ni thugs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che ni thugs rdo rje'o //
translated: Similarly, the great king Vajrasattva is the vajra mind.

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje @93a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje @93a * //
translated: The vajra of the Buddha

original: gsung 'dzin ni gsung rdo rje'o //
analyzed: gsung 'dzin ni gsung rdo rje'o //
translated: is the vajra speech.

original: de bas na de la sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de la sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the generation of all heroes is called the vajra.

original: da ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig phan yon dang bcas pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig phan yon dang bcas pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the secret consecration is taught together with the benefits of the commitments:

original: bzhin bzangs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bzhin bzangs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Good son, etc.

original: bzhin bzangs zhes pa ni gtso bo'i rig ma'o //🔽ma lta bu'i sems dang ldan pas na phan par 'dod pa'i bud med rnyed nas zhes so //
analyzed: bzhin bzangs zhes pa ni gtso bo'i rig ma'o // ma lta bu'i sems dang ldan pas na phan par 'dod pa'i bud med rnyed nas zhes so //
translated: Good son is the knowledge consort of the principal figure.

original: ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci bya zhe na /
translated: Having found a woman who is desirous of benefit, with a mind like a mother, what should one do?

original: cho ga bzhin zhes te bar ma'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi la sogs pas dag par byas nas /
analyzed: cho ga bzhin zhes te bar ma'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi la sogs pas dag par byas nas /
translated: “According to the rite” means that one should purify oneself with the four-branched service and recitation, and so on.

original: gnas dben par tshogs kyi mchod pa brtsams la /
analyzed: gnas dben par tshogs kyi mchod pa brtsams la /
translated: One should begin the feast offering in an isolated place.

original: de dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i gsang pa ni zla bar zhu ba ste /
analyzed: de dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i gsang pa ni zla bar zhu ba ste /
translated: The “secret” of union with her is the melting of the moon.

original: blo brtan pa'i slob mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid du bsams la bza' bar bya zhes so //
analyzed: blo brtan pa'i slob mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid du bsams la bza' bar bya zhes so //
translated: The disciple of firm mind should imagine that he is the nature of the gathering of all tathāgatas and should eat.

original: de'i yon tan yang de ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i yon tan yang de ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The qualities of that are “that” and so on.

original: 'jam dpal dang gzi brjid mnyam pa ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' ste nges ngag par byas nas zhes so //
analyzed: 'jam dpal dang gzi brjid mnyam pa ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' ste nges ngag par byas nas zhes so //
translated: “Equal to Mañjuśrī in splendor” is a bodhisattva on the tenth stage.

original: mi snang bdag pos zhes pa rtog pa'i lus ngag gis mi snang bar byas na /
analyzed: mi snang bdag pos zhes pa rtog pa'i lus ngag gis mi snang bar byas na /
translated: “The lord of invisibility” is the body and speech of the imagination.

original: 'dzam bu gser gyi mdangs 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dzam bu gser gyi mdangs 'drar 'gyur //
translated: “One becomes like the luster of gold.”

original: zhes pa'o // da ni bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa zos pa las mi snang bar sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // da ni bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa zos pa las mi snang bar sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, having taught the practice of invisibility from eating the five nectars, and so on,

original: bshad pa'am zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa'am zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: he says “the explanation” and so on.

original: de yang gong ma ltar byis pa'i rnal 'byor pas dang po'i cho ga la gnas pa'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bshad ba ste dri chen nam 'bras chan la sogs pa'i bza' ba ji snyed pa 'am /
analyzed: de yang gong ma ltar byis pa'i rnal 'byor pas dang po'i cho ga la gnas pa'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bshad ba ste dri chen nam 'bras chan la sogs pa'i bza' ba ji snyed pa 'am /
translated: Furthermore, as above, the yogi who is a beginner, abiding in the first rite, should place in the center of the maṇḍala of the picture as much food as he can eat, such as feces or boiled rice,

original: sha lnga la sogs pa bhanda'i nang du bcug la /
analyzed: sha lnga la sogs pa bhanda'i nang du bcug la /
translated: and the five meats and so forth placed in a skull cup.

original: cho ga bzhin du sngags nas ni //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du sngags nas ni //
translated: Having enchanted it with the mantra according to the rite,

original: zhes pa ni rlung la sogs pa'i rim pas rnam par sbyangs la /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rlung la sogs pa'i rim pas rnam par sbyangs la /
translated: one should purify it with the stages of the vāyu and so forth.

original: rang gi sngags bzlas pas 'bar ba la sogs pa mthong nas zos na sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi mthong zhes so //🔽bshang ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas //
analyzed: rang gi sngags bzlas pas 'bar ba la sogs pa mthong nas zos na sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi mthong zhes so // bshang ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas //
translated: If one sees the blazing and so forth, and then eats it, even the buddhas will not see one.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: Having taken the feces according to the rite,

original: dri chen blangs nas 'khar ba'i snod du ra dkar mo'i 'o mas bsnur te bskams nas kham phor bug pa can gyi steng du sbyar /
analyzed: dri chen blangs nas 'khar ba'i snod du ra dkar mo'i 'o mas bsnur te bskams nas kham phor bug pa can gyi steng du sbyar /
translated: having taken the feces, one should dry it in a metal container with the milk of a white goat.

original: de'ang dang rlung la gnas pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas me bcug ste bskol ba bug pa med pa la 'dzag pa blangs nas /
analyzed: de'ang dang rlung la gnas pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas me bcug ste bskol ba bug pa med pa la 'dzag pa blangs nas /
translated: Furthermore, having placed it on the mandala of fire that abides in the wind of the tongue, one should heat it with fire, and having taken it without a hole,🔽one should make a pill by incanting it one hundred and eight times. If one eats it, one will become a buddha.

original: brgya rtsa brgyad bskul nas ril bu byas te zos na sangs @93b rgyas nyid sdig pa'i 'dam rdzab skems pas na nyi ma ste /
analyzed: brgya rtsa brgyad bskul nas ril bu byas te zos na sangs @93b rgyas nyid sdig pa'i 'dam rdzab skems pas na nyi ma ste /
translated: Since it dries up the swamp of sin, it is the sun.

original: des kyang mi mthong ngo zhes so //
analyzed: des kyang mi mthong ngo zhes so //
translated: Even that will not be seen.

original: khyim la sogs pa'i cho ga yang zangs kyi snod du ba dmar mo'i 'o mar bskams la /
analyzed: khyim la sogs pa'i cho ga yang zangs kyi snod du ba dmar mo'i 'o mar bskams la /
translated: The rite of the house, etc., is as follows: Having dried cow's milk in a copper vessel,

original: kham phor gyi cho ga gong ma bzhin du sbyor ro //
analyzed: kham phor gyi cho ga gong ma bzhin du sbyor ro //
translated: one should apply the rite of the clay pot as above.

original: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i ril bu'i dngos grub kyi sbyor ba la lcags gsum gyis dkri ba ra bya ba'i rdzas rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i ril bu'i dngos grub kyi sbyor ba la lcags gsum gyis dkri ba ra bya ba'i rdzas rnams gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in the above-mentioned practice of the pill siddhi, the substances to be wrapped in the three metals are taught.

original: bshad ba glang po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bshad ba glang po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The explanation is the three metals, etc.

original: de la / dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor pa yis //
analyzed: de la / dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor pa yis //
translated: Therein, the union of the two organs

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: is as follows.

original: bdag gi dbang po dang rang gi lha'i dbang po gnyis su med par byas pa la bya ste /
analyzed: bdag gi dbang po dang rang gi lha'i dbang po gnyis su med par byas pa la bya ste /
translated: One should do this by making one’s own organ nondual with the organ of one’s deity.

original: skabs 'dir rdo rje dang padma la mi bya ste /
analyzed: skabs 'dir rdo rje dang padma la mi bya ste /
translated: Here, one should not do this with the vajra and lotus.

original: dngos grub thun mong rnams ni phyag rgya las skye pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos grub thun mong rnams ni phyag rgya las skye pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the common powers do not arise from the consort.

original: gzhan ni go sla bsam bshad do //
analyzed: gzhan ni go sla bsam bshad do //
translated: The others are easy to understand, so I will not explain them.

original: de rnams ji lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyis bya zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams ji lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyis bya zhe na /
translated: By what kind of yoga should one do this?

original: de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
translated: It is also the vajra-holder.

original: rang gi lha gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bas ji skad du bshad pa bzhin du phyag rgya chen po bskyed nas mtha' gnyis dgag pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs nas /
analyzed: rang gi lha gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bas ji skad du bshad pa bzhin du phyag rgya chen po bskyed nas mtha' gnyis dgag pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs nas /
translated: Having generated the great seal in accordance with the explanation by the yoga of any of one’s deities, one should bless it in order to block the two extremes.

original: tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i ril bu khar bcug nas bsgoms na ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i ril bu khar bcug nas bsgoms na ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
translated: Having placed the pill endowed with the assembly in one’s mouth, if one meditates, one will have the qualities as described.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Knowledge” and so forth.

original: dpag tshad bye ba tsam gyi steng du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes rang gi'o //
analyzed: dpag tshad bye ba tsam gyi steng du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes rang gi'o //
translated: One will go up to a distance of ten million leagues.

original: stong gsum bdag po yang rang gi'o //
analyzed: stong gsum bdag po yang rang gi'o //
translated: The lord of the trichiliocosm is also one's own.

original: 'dod khams gnas pa lha'i bu mo lha'i longs spyod dang ldan pa brtul zhugs che ba la 'dod pa spyod ces so //
analyzed: 'dod khams gnas pa lha'i bu mo lha'i longs spyod dang ldan pa brtul zhugs che ba la 'dod pa spyod ces so //
translated: The daughters of the gods who dwell in the desire realm, endowed with divine enjoyments, are said to engage in desire with one of great discipline.

original: yang na gzugs khams zhes pa ni gal te de na yong na yang zhes mthu phul du byung bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yang na gzugs khams zhes pa ni gal te de na yong na yang zhes mthu phul du byung bar bstan pa'o //
translated: Or, the form realm is taught to be the highest power, even if it exists there.

original: mi snang ba'i ngo bo las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste rdo rje 'chad chen po'o //
analyzed: mi snang ba'i ngo bo las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste rdo rje 'chad chen po'o //
translated: Since it does not go beyond the nature of invisibility, it is a pledge, the great vajra speech.

original: da ni de'i don la ngo mtshar che ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni de'i don la ngo mtshar che ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the wonder of its meaning is taught:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then and so on.

original: yid la dbang ba zhes pa ni de rnams ni thugs nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas gang du bltas pa ltar 'byung pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid la dbang ba zhes pa ni de rnams ni thugs nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas gang du bltas pa ltar 'byung pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mind-controlled are those who realize the mind just as it is, because whatever they look at arises.

original: skye bos shes par bya ba'i phyir thugs dam pa ltar snang ngo //
analyzed: skye bos shes par bya ba'i phyir thugs dam pa ltar snang ngo //
translated: In order to be known by beings, it appears like the sublime mind.

original: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni mthar skyes dang sngags dang bdud rtsi ril bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni mthar skyes dang sngags dang bdud rtsi ril bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: The wonder is the supreme arising of mantras, amṛta pills, and so on.

original: rab tu ngo mtshar che zhes pa ni sngags kyi las sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa'o //🔽mchog tu mi 'gyur gsang pa zhes pa ni mthar @94a * //
analyzed: rab tu ngo mtshar che zhes pa ni sngags kyi las sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa'o // mchog tu mi 'gyur gsang pa zhes pa ni mthar @94a * //
translated: The words very wondrous refer to the accomplishment of the various activities of mantra.

original: skyes kyis phul du byung ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'o //
analyzed: skyes kyis phul du byung ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'o //
translated: The words supremely unchanging secret refer to the attainment of the highest wisdom.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis dag ces pa ni dri chen la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis mi snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis dag ces pa ni dri chen la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis mi snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: The words pure by nature refer to the invisibility of the substances such as feces.

original: shin tu dri med chos zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor bas ril bu las yon tan thob pa'o //🔽da ni dbang bskur ba'i rigs kyi bdag po'i nges pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: shin tu dri med chos zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor bas ril bu las yon tan thob pa'o // da ni dbang bskur ba'i rigs kyi bdag po'i nges pa gsungs pa /
translated: The words very stainless Dharma refer to the attainment of the qualities from the pill by the practitioner of the great seal.🔽 Now, the determination of the lords of the families for the consecration is stated:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste bshad zin to //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste bshad zin to //
translated: Then, etc.

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The Buddha Vajra is the Great Vajradhara.

original: de thams cad kyi ngo bo bsan  can rnams so //
analyzed: de thams cad kyi ngo bo bsan  can rnams so //
translated: All of them are the essence of the vajra-holders.

original: rdo rje'i sbyor pa ni mi bskyod pa'i ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i sbyor pa ni mi bskyod pa'i ste /
translated: The vajra-union is that of Akshobhya.

original: bsnyengs par gyur pa ni de nyid gcig la gcig dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: bsnyengs par gyur pa ni de nyid gcig la gcig dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The frightened ones are the consecration of each other.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas gang ba cing //
analyzed: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas gang ba cing //
translated: The cause is pervaded by the fruit,

original: 'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas btab //
analyzed: 'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas btab //
translated: and the fruit is pervaded by the cause.

original: ces so // sangs rgyas rdo rje rab byed pa //
analyzed: ces so // sangs rgyas rdo rje rab byed pa //
translated: The Buddha is the maker of the vajra.

original: zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: This is Akshobhya.

original: des rdo rje 'dzin rnams te rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzhi'i dbang bskur bas mnyes par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: des rdo rje 'dzin rnams te rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzhi'i dbang bskur bas mnyes par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: By the consecration of the four, Vairochana and so forth, he is pleased.

original: rdo rje spyan gyi gzugs la sogs //
analyzed: rdo rje spyan gyi gzugs la sogs //
translated: The vajra eye and so forth.

original: zhes pa ni spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu'o //
translated: This is the ten goddesses such as Lochana.

original: gtsug tor zhes pa ni bde bar gshegs pa lnga dang drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po ste dbu la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gtsug tor zhes pa ni bde bar gshegs pa lnga dang drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po ste dbu la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The ushnisha is the five Sugatas and the sixth, Great Vajradhara, because they abide in the head.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:🔽The six kings who turn the wheel

original: 'khor los skyur ba'i rgyal po drug / gtsug tor zhes ni rnam par 'byung //
analyzed: 'khor los skyur ba'i rgyal po drug / gtsug tor zhes ni rnam par 'byung //
translated: are called the ushnisha.

original: zhes so // de la gtsug tor lngas rang rang gi rigs mnyes par byed pa yin zhes so //
analyzed: zhes so // de la gtsug tor lngas rang rang gi rigs mnyes par byed pa yin zhes so //
translated: There, the five ushnisha please their own families.

original: khro bo'i nang nas de mchog ste //
analyzed: khro bo'i nang nas de mchog ste //
translated: Among the wrathful ones, he is supreme.

original: zhes pa ni khro bo bcu la gtsug tor mchog ste gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: zhes pa ni khro bo bcu la gtsug tor mchog ste gang yin zhe na /
translated: This is the supreme uṣṇīṣa for the ten wrathful ones.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do //🔽des gshin rje gshed mnyes par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do // des gshin rje gshed mnyes par byed pa'o //
translated: “Buddha” is Vairocana.🔽He is pleased by Yamāntaka.

original: rdo rje zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa ste khro bo brgyad mnyes par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa ste khro bo brgyad mnyes par byed pa'o //
translated: “Vajra” is Akṣobhya. He is pleased by the eight wrathful ones.

original: rab tu bsgoms pa ni snang ba mtha' yas kyis rta mgrin mnyes par byed pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: rab tu bsgoms pa ni snang ba mtha' yas kyis rta mgrin mnyes par byed pa'o zhes so //
translated: “Well-cultivated” is Amitābha. He is pleased by Hayagrīva.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po chos mchog ste rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rig 'dzin grub pa rnams la dkon mchog dpal dbu rgyan du bsgom mo //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po chos mchog ste rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rig 'dzin grub pa rnams la dkon mchog dpal dbu rgyan du bsgom mo //
translated: “King of knowledge” is the supreme quality. One should meditate on Ratnasaṃbhava as the crown ornament of the accomplished knowledge-holders such as Vairocana and so forth.

original: rig 'dzin rgyal mo ni spyan ma la sogs pa'i rig 'dzin grub pa la tshe dpag tu med pa dbu rgyan du bsgom zhes so /
analyzed: rig 'dzin rgyal mo ni spyan ma la sogs pa'i rig 'dzin grub pa la tshe dpag tu med pa dbu rgyan du bsgom zhes so /
translated: “Queen of knowledge” is Locanā. One should meditate on Amitāyus as the crown ornament of the accomplished knowledge-holders such as Locanā and so forth.

original: thams cad las byed sngags rnams ni mngag gzhug pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad las byed sngags rnams ni mngag gzhug pa ste /
translated: “All-accomplishing mantras” are the servants.

original: gdon mi @94b bra bas dbu rgyan du bsgom mo //
analyzed: gdon mi @94b bra bas dbu rgyan du bsgom mo //
translated: One should meditate on Amoghasiddhi as the crown ornament.

original: sngags rnams thams cad ni tshangs pa dang drag po dang dbang phyug dang dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags rnams thams cad ni tshangs pa dang drag po dang dbang phyug dang dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
translated: All the mantras are Brahma, Rudra, Ishvara, Viravajra, and so on.

original: de'i dbu rgyan du rdo rje sems dpa' ste mi bskyod pa rnam par bsgom zhes so //
analyzed: de'i dbu rgyan du rdo rje sems dpa' ste mi bskyod pa rnam par bsgom zhes so //
translated: One should visualize Akshobhya-vajra, i.e. Vajrasattva, as the crown of all of them.

original: gnod sbyin mo rnams la gshin rje gshed dbu rgyan du brtag par bya zhes so //
analyzed: gnod sbyin mo rnams la gshin rje gshed dbu rgyan du brtag par bya zhes so //
translated: One should visualize Yamantaka as the crown of all the yakshini-s.

original: sngags rnams thams cad ces pa ni lhar sbyor ba thams cad kyi spyi bo nas lha re re zhing rig ma dang ldan par bskul ba'i las kyis byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun 'bab pas na shis pa'o //
analyzed: sngags rnams thams cad ces pa ni lhar sbyor ba thams cad kyi spyi bo nas lha re re zhing rig ma dang ldan par bskul ba'i las kyis byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun 'bab pas na shis pa'o //
translated: All the mantras means all the mantras that are applied to the deities. The function of the invocation of each deity together with the knowledge-woman is auspicious because the stream of bodhicitta flows from the crown of each deity.

original: de bas na rig lnga ma yin par mngon no //
analyzed: de bas na rig lnga ma yin par mngon no //
translated: Therefore, it is clear that there are five knowledge-women.

original: de rnams ni dpral ba la sogs par dgod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams ni dpral ba la sogs par dgod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are placed on the forehead and so on.🔽This wheel of meditation is the consecration of meditation.

original: bsam gtan 'khor lo 'di zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba 'di ni bsam gtan gyi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan 'khor lo 'di zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba 'di ni bsam gtan gyi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: This consecration is the consecration of meditation.

original: ji skad du //
analyzed: ji skad du //
translated: As it is said:

original: bsam gtan 'khor lo thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba ni brtag pa ste zhes so //
analyzed: bsam gtan 'khor lo thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba ni brtag pa ste zhes so //
translated: The consecration of all the wheels of meditative concentration is the investigation.

original: de sngags de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang dkyil 'khor dag mnyes par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de sngags de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang dkyil 'khor dag mnyes par byed pa ste /
translated: That mantra is the pleasing of the Tathagatas and the maṇḍalas.

original: longs spyod bzhi las sgrub pa chen por gsungs te zhes so //
analyzed: longs spyod bzhi las sgrub pa chen por gsungs te zhes so //
translated: It is said to be the great accomplishment from among the four enjoyments.

original: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na dam tshig chen por ston pa'o zhes so //🔽da ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i slob ma la lha dbab ba dang / de ma thag pa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor pa'i mthu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na dam tshig chen por ston pa'o zhes so // da ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i slob ma la lha dbab ba dang / de ma thag pa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor pa'i mthu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: It is the teaching of the great vow because it is not to be transgressed.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
